But things change when one of the head of the fallen angels appears and threatens Rias and her group - including the school.  Now the real fight begins as Kiiba;s history comes to light and he brings about something that might be able to beat Freed.  But what will happen when the White Dragon Gear appears and gets involved in the battle?  What is going to happen to everyone in the coming days?The holy sword arc is over leading to the peace treaty.  It followed the anime well and I am waiting for the next book.  \

Well the week is almost over and the switched twins have managed to keep up the images of being each other.  But when Megu discovers the secret of the toughest boy in school, is her crush going to end before it begins?  And what about the feud between her (brother) and the school bully princess?  How is he going to fix things so there is no fallout when they switch back, but also for the girl that he has fallen for?  And when other secrets are revealed, is this the end of the story - or the beginning of a new one?I actually have to admit this has been a good series so far.  a lot of  twists you never would have expected are revealed, and the ending you probably expected, but not in the way they pulled it off.  I will keep reading this and see what new excitement hits our duo siblings.

Well the days have arrived - the mothers visitations are here.  Now our hero is expecting some nice quiet time, but when not only each one is as sexy as their daughters - they almost have as many issues.  How can Kazuha put up with a snake woman trying to kidnap him for a harem party, a harpy who looks like a cast member of Jersey Shore, and a centaur who has a secret about her past that involves her daughter?  But that is not all as Smith tries to push for an answer to the marriage question, and he tries to face each girls feelings head on.  Can he and the house survive the hijinks, and why is he always seem to be in a field with Lala after each one?This volume really pushes the edge on fan service, hilarity, and straight comedy.  If you enjoy the series this one is one not to be missed as you feel for each girl as they each face their hearts for the one that they all love (except for Lala who is there to protect him from Death).  Suu comes up with the most likely answer, but the question is how can they pull it off?  I can not wait for the next one, which we have to wait until next year for.
I have played the and picked this up.  It has two disks, each one for each side of the game.  If you enjoy persona this is a must have for any fan.
The sequel to Xenoblade Chronicles has a great soundtrack, I already listened to it twice and have enjoyed it majorly.  The music and songs are amazing and memorable.  A must for all fans

Eco has transformed into her dragon form and is attacking the city.  Ash seems helpless to stop her, but assistance comes from an unexpected source - Milgauss.  His past is revealed and the reason why he killed his dragon.  But Mordred is having his own issues - Navi is helping Eco resist him and Eco begins her path to her destiny - as well as her partner's.  Can they stop the dark dragon, or will Navi and Eco be absorbed into an ultimate evil.This arc ends, with both Eco and Ash starting their path to their destiny.  The story and well drawn art really flow well in this story.  The bonus chapters are the usual ecchi trope (breast sizing, panties and heart searching), nothing offensive or out of the ordinary.  I look forward to this great series as the author knows what the fans enjoy with the deep story that he has written.  Can not wait for the next.
I bought this for a friend.  She loves the model and the figure.  It is a little smaller than most figures, but does not detract for fans of the series or the characters.

In a world of monsters, you need someone to keep an eye on all the problems going on with junior high students.  Nurse Hitomi is on the job, with her big heart and all seeing eye she helps those who come to her with their problems be it a zombie girl who keeps coming apart at the seams, to the girl who no one else can see in this light monster comedy series.I enjoyed it, the art is akin to the art of Kill La Kill but the characters are enjoyable and the interactions are as normal as you can expect from a monster world.  If you enjoy Monster Masume, you should enjoy this one.  I will look forward to the next issue.

As the group enter the ancient dragon graveyard, the evil Milguass rises an army of undead dragons in order to destroy the academy.  The identity of this character is discovered by the princess, but can they hold out long enough to defeat the newest threats and restore the faith between a new rider and her steed.  Then Sylvie and Ash get a summons from Sylvie's father, but the threat of the empire looms as they plan to kidnap Eco for their own purposes.This is the start of the Awakening arc in which Eco's true purpose will be revealed.  Their is the standard fan service and some nudity, but compared to the first two not as much as it is going more in the development side of the characters.  But it was a good read and cannot wait for the next one.

The legend states when the sleeping princess wakes, the moons will collide and bring about the end of the world.  But for Kor Meteor, he just wants to follow in his famous mothers and grandfathers steps and be a great Somatic and help people with a condition called despir.  But when a pretty girl Kohaku washes up on the beach, this will start him on a path where he will join others to stop the evil witch, Innarose from seizing control of Kohaku's Spira and bringing about the end of the world.You can pick this up at your local Gamestop as it was an exclusive to them only.  The combat is like other Tales games, choose your party - set up macros and use special attacks to beat your opponents.  The story is great, the characters are well developed from the quiet Kohaku, to the busty egnimatic Ignes.  The cut scenes are great.  If you are looking for a good RPG, this should be in your library.

Another great soundtrack from those who compose the Final Fantasy universe.  These three disks are full of haunting and uplifting music.  Now while the case has a small crack in it, it does not detract from the quality of the music and the disks were in prime condition.  A must for fans.

The stress between Kazehya and his father blows over during career conferences as Sawako overhears everything.  She invites him over where he spills out his frustration.  But Valentines day is around the corner and the other girls ask Sawako to help them make chocolates for their other halves.  Sawako is ready to give them to him, but things tend to go awry.  Can she give her love the chocolates she made, or will Karumi or his father end up being an obstacle to her goal?I have finally caught up with the series, and have been enjoying it.  Now we know the series will probably end in soon and I plan on reading each one until then.  I just hope the author does bring about the ending most of us want, a wedding scene.  I can not wait for the next story and the start of their third year.

Finally, what started in the class trip finally bears fruit.  Sawako and Kazeha first kiss, and a much needed talk about their feelings towards each other.  He finally breaks down and admits he wants her only for himself, and knows she has been working so hard to come out of the shadows everone put her in, and she admits that she is jealous of everyone's attention of him and only wants his smile to herself.  Then its girl talk time and Ayane, Chii, and Sawa sit down and tell each other of the updates of their relationships with their counterpart, the biggest one of course being CHii and Ryu.  Then everyone comes over for a party, which surprises Sawa's dad when he comes home from work and he grills Kazeka to ensure he still cares for his little girl.This was a tear jerker to say the least.  I am glad things are finally moving in the right direction for all the girl (and there are times i wish i could reach into the story and smack Kazyeha on the back of the head).  Also they need to make a new season of the anime, this part of the story should be watched by all.

Youta has always looked after his sweet twin sister Hikaru and doted on her that he has a rep of being a sis-con.  However on their 16th birthday, things are about to change.  His parents tell him that they are actually not related by blood, which everyone else in the family knew but him.  But when his sister runs away and they both get into an accident things look bad, but are about to get weird.  Now he is stuck in her body, she is in his body and she announces that she has always loved him and now has the body to make her dreams come true.  And to make matters worse, Youta not only has to deal with different body functions, but also clothes, and a new threat - the girl he has a crush on as a boy actually bats for the other team and has her eyes on Hikaru.  How long will they stay like this, and can he survive with his sanity, manhood, and virginity intact?Overall it is a twist on the Freaky Friday theme, and while an OT rated, very little to no nudity, the only thing some people will complain about is the "forbidden love" theme.  I think i will have to follow the story to see what happens next, just to appease my own curiosity.

With the events of Russia behind them Argos squad prepares for the next step of the testing of their new TSF's, a battle royale between some of the best squads from around the world, including the U.S. Infinity squad that Yuuya was a part of.  However things get out of hand when a renegade group takes control of the test base and announce that they consider the BETA's as gods and the next step in evolution.  Can Yui and Yuuya lead the squads to victory of human enemies, or will their tensions and secrets destroy them and bring about a final BETA victory.This is the second half of the series, and while the first part had its moments this one takes it up a notch.  From new rivals for Yuuya's attention, to a new threat, this story is just as good as the first part.  If you watched the first part enjoy this one and hope that they do a new season as I really would like to see how this love square resolves itself.

Now that Sawako and Kazuya are seeing each other, we get to see the wonders and akwardness of young love.  The two really begin learning about each other and what it means to be a couple, right up to when Sawako's Mom sees them holding hands.  Then it's the fun of meeting her parents and the father grill that most teenage boys should go through before getting serious.  Then its the story of how Chizu and Ayane met, and they did not start out as close as they did - but with a little help from a certain spooky girl they get to know each other.This is one of the milestones i was hoping to read.  I just finished the anime and just got to this one in the manga form.  I loved her fathers reactions to meeting his little girls' beau and the back story of two other favorite characters.  I wish they would start a new season of the anime, because i really think watching this would be hilarious.

The story of Kazeya, Satallizer and the rest finally get the anticipated US release.  After the events of the most recent NOVA clash, a new program is introduced - the E-Pandoras.  Girls who do not have the proper compatibility for normal Stigmata are given artifical ones in order to boost the numbers to defend the world.  However when a dangerous secret about the project is discovered, one girl must face her dark past in order to save those involved.  Can she overcome her greatest challenge by herself, or will the feelings of one be enough to save them all.I watched this originally on HULU and have also waited for this to finally get a US release.  While you will get the usual fight scenes with a lot of blood, clothes ripping, and fan service, there is a darker story compared to the first season.  This is more for mature viewers as some of the scenes will be pretty brutal, but for fans it will be a must see.
I am Groot.  He is a dancing bobblehead and an enjoyable add to my desk at work.  Get him for fans.
I just got these two lovely ladies.  They are well painted and very large (about 13 inches).  This was a bargain compared to buying the asuna for $60 on ebay.  A must for all collectors

Akko is confused.  As her best friend Mari is going out with a crush from junior high, her feelings flip from confusion to saddness.  But when it is learned Mari was dumped, she thinks that there is a chance that she can figure out her heart and tell the one she has fallen for how she feels.  But will it take some advice from their playgirl friend to put them on the right track, or will this young love die before it has a chance to bloom?I was loaned the first part by a friend who learned I read Kashimashi, so i decided to buy both parts.  This was well written and drawn, and the characters were enjoyable to read.  Each one had their own personality which was good to see.  I do feel the ending was satisfactory, but I would have liked to see one more chapter - say 5 years later at the first reunion we see what happened to all of them, and of course everyone's reaction to the two lovers (thing is I did sort of imagine some of what the two would have gone through, from the parents, to their first major fight, and a couple of issues that probably was never thought of, and have written it down just for the fun of it).

Torus Vin and the crew of the Stargazer is back.  After the events of the big scam - the ship is getting upgraded (especially with a gnome weapons smith), the couple is planning a trip to the Observatory, and everything seems to be getting back to normal.  Then one day he gets a message from Vevera with a proposition for him.  Apparently she is more than just a simple courtesean, and she offers a chance to get back at the slavers he hates so much.  However things are not as simple as it seems, as an inquisitor has been hired by the slaver council to search for spies and possible traitors - and the twist is Vevera is falling for her  How can a man who is a pirate be able to walk the fine line between his honor and freedom.This was a great book.  I love the crew and the whole story behind it.  This is full of action, love. angst , emotional decisions, and many choices.  I hope the next book comes soon.

I just listened to this and i enjoyed it.  The songs and music scores just blend into each other as they tell a story like Shakespeare's Comedy of Errors.  I can not wait to see the movie and see it all come together.

The Dungeon - a mysterous place where monsters lurk on every floor and danger can sneak up on you.  A place where people and beings from all over come in hopes to earn fame and riches.  However for one young adventurer, Bell, he has only one dream - to find the most elusive of creatures - GIRLS.  And he found the one of his dreams - however she is one of the most powerful warriors of the most powerful guilds, where he is the only child of a just formed guild.  But he has a secret skill, one that if developed properly under the guidance of his goddess can make him a legend among legends, provided he does not get killed first.  But unknown to him, the girl of his dreams is not the only one who has eyes on him and when heavenly minds notice something they will do anything to get what they want.I enjoyed this start, from the building of his stats to the randomness of the dungeon it reminds me of the old school role playing games.  Starting out as a low level newbie, you have to grind to level up gathering money and items to build up gear and items.  It definately is a harem story with several women after the poor hapless Bell, and he is clueless about most of them as he has his eyes on one woman.  I can not wait for the next book to see what comes next.

How do new devils gain status - by doing jobs and doing them well.  Well Asia is starting her path to being a new devil, and she has help with Koneko.  From Cosplay fashion shows, to panty thief capturing, to maid cafe servers - can these two devilsih cuties rise up and complete each request.this is just a side story, but it not only fills in a gap that most people would not notice - but it is enjoyable and light hearted.  While still a mature title, it is a bit milder than the main story and a must read for fans of the series.

Keima just wants to play his games and continue being the God of Conquests - however he and his klutzy sidekick Elsa are called to serve once again.  This time he is not looking for just Lost souls, he is looking for six particular souls known as the Jupiter Sisters.  Long ago these ladies ended the ancient war between Heaven and Hell and brought about the current system, but there are those who wish to bring back the ancient ways.  HIs only clue is they are residing in six of his previous conquests  which will be hard as their memories were erased after the kiss, or are they?  Assassins, hunters and divine kisses are in store for you in this story arc of the WORLD GOD ONLY KNOWS.I watched this on crunchyroll and it is as good as the previous arcs.  While you expect a lot of hijinks and other mishaps to still take place, this one has a more serious tone as the stakes are higher and more intense.  Also you will see a change in Keima this time, as he becomes more of this world than the virtual.  If you enjoyed the last two, you will enjoy this one and hope the final arc comes soon.

Takamiya is starting out as an apprentice witch, and with the hottest girl in class as his master.  But things are going to get harder as a very powerful Tower witch appears and gives him something that is supposed to release the "white stuff" within him.  Then add his bro-con stalker sister, who also happens to be a witch and an escape from the witch prison of a high level evil witch, can this hot couple stand strong together - or is Takamiya going to have to pull out his wild card and find out what his white stuff can do and find out more of his past with Kagare.I enjoyed this series and the correlation between the light mangas and the anime has been pretty spot on.  I just love the fact that his mother is a complete space case, and why has she not been freaked out by the walking stuffed bear.  But on to the next book and the fight commences.

After the fallen angel incident, Rias has a new devil to her lineup - and just in time to.  As Issei and Aisia work to get contracts and become stronger, they notice the president is not acting herself.  Then one night Rias appears with a very unusual (but for Issei desirable) request, but is interupted by the queen of her brother - the devil King himself.  They soon learn that Rias is betrothed to the scion of house Pheonix, and he is even more of a letch than Issei.  The only way to settle it is through the rating game - a contest where devil use their pieces in combat to take each other out.  So not the training begins - can team Grimorie come up with a strategy to defeat the more powerful opponents?The series has been great so far.  Watched the first season and working on the second one.  Can not wait for the next installment, as well as the little side story later this month with Asia and Konaka.

While this is not the official Hallmark ornament (those are very hard to find, but i have two of them), this ornament is sturdy and still shows the cuteness of the snowman of frozen.  I would suggest looking around to find this cheaper (i found mine at toys r us).

this is the music score of another top Disney animated movie (also a Marvel franchise as well).  I love the mix of futuristic sounds and traditional music from the far east as the smooth flow of the music as follows Hiro and his big inflatable buddy Beymax (who is more than enjoyable) as they and their friends come together to stop a dangerous foe from destroying San Frantokyo. A must for fans

Now I am only a few hours into it, but this game is truly amazing.  I spent an hour deciding on my character and class (qunari fighter) and making her the way i desire.  The fighting system is very easy to use - as one who played the other two I am very familiar, but the new thing is the tatical mode, which comes in handy when you are outnumbered and need to get rid of a few pesky range attackers.  All the characters are well voiced and the usual banter between party members is there (right now its Verric and Cassandra, but i cannot wait to get others - including Morrigan (too bad she is not playable but I will love to see her).  The graphics are crisp on my TV and the free roam is skyrm-esque where you can walk around - find things and kill a few baddies on the way.  I have not yet run a multiplayer - but i hear its like Mass Effect 3 in its content and play modes.Now I do not know how people could not know that this would need memory.  It was announced last year when the new systems came out that the newer games would be larger and would need space to play so a 4gb xb360 would not be able to run it (but i have the 320 HALO system so no problem there), especially on the cloud.  But this game is more than worth getting the hardrive to play it.  A sure win game

The time has come.  Each of the girls get to go out with Kirito, with a Mon squad escort for protection.  But during each date, someone with a D connection comes out to interfere, but is any of them the one who sent the letter to Kirito.  Then the Mon squad gets a chance at dating him (as the others did not have any luck and it was their day off), and each one of them comes up with entertaining issues (Tio with clothes shopping, Zombina with her parts falling off, and Masuno being herself).  Can they find out who it is, before Kirito loses his head over something.this one was way to funny, but will give a warning the ecchii is amped up a lot so it may not be good for younger readers.  But seeing all the girls being treated like normal girls, despite killer trees, giant slimes girls, and a dolphin hugger shows that he sees them not as monsters, but girls with their own personalities.  I have been enjoying this series and can not wait to the next one to get a"head" of the situation.

Eco is not doing well.  She is having nightmares of someone who is calling her the Daughter of Avalon and Ash is not there to protect her.  But Ash is also having problems of his own - Rebecca and Jessica are turning up the heat to get close to him, and the Princess is trying to fight her own desires as well.  But when the annual training camp gets close Ash is chosen to go, but the real surprise is a first year named Lucca is also chosen - a young elf girl who is having troubles of her own and her Dragon will not let her near him.  How can Ash help this young, shy girl and her steed be able to fly again before it is to late, as a masked antagonist arrives again to bring about another undead meanace in an attempt to destroy the world.This book was more into seeing Ash develop as well as a first glimpse into Eco's true purpose.  It also has the obligatory Beach episode with cute girls running around in swimsuits.  Now despite what the other review says, the nudity is cranked down a lot as the author went into building the plot arc for Lucca and to finally have Ash step towards his destiny with Eco (as if it is a real surprise).  A good way to start the path the the overall finale as fates connect and glimpses of the future are revealed in this 4th volume of a top selling series.

Poor Lindsey has her hands full with the holiday coming up and two men vying for attention you would think a visit from her globe trotting brother would be a welcome relief.  But when a man is killed in the library room that the crafternooners use and her brother is taken by a pretty lady, she is drawn into another case where more than a kidnapping is involved.  How is this simple library head supposed to get out of this one, and maybe rescue her brother in the process?Honestly this was an interesting story.  Between a spy movie feel, with a little romance tossed in for good measure, this kept flipping pages to the end.  I particularly enjoyed Robbie and Sully's antics to get her alone with them throughout the whole incident (from getting drunk playing go fish, to having a lot of false calls made to the water taxi).  I would say this is more than a normal story.  Until the next one

Many fans of the vocaloids seem to like luka over the fact character MIku.  Now you can own the POP adaptation of this popular character for you collection. She was well painted as normal of the makers.  A must for fans.
Sorry, but for the price they should have advised it only had 4 songs and the one video.  I did send it back becuause I was hoping for a good soundtrack to listen to.

Isiem is a former Nidal wizard fighting against the Cheliax government to free them from the devil pact.  When a friend tells him of a job to enter one of the darkest places of his old haunts to locate a weapon that might be able to put an end to the devils and the demons of the Worldwound, he joins up with a paladin, a Sarenite priest, an old shadowcaller friend, and a few members of the Aspis Consortium (they finally get to have some time in a book).  But when they get there they discover the danger is not just physical - and if they are not careful they may just unleash a greater threat on Galorian, one that has been waiting thousands of years to be free.The author did a great job with the storytelling.  From the beginning up to they locate the place you feel the weight of the locations, and when they find what they are looking for - the danger they have to keep it.  My favorite parts was when they located the lair - he kept the oppressive atmosphere in his writting so you also felt what the characters felt (very cuthluesque).  I good read (especially as i finished it on Halloween).

Recieved this the same time I received the sorceress statue.  the figure is amazing, but the skin was a little orangey rather than a tan color.  But the lines were crisp and the axe is lovely, but be careful putting in her hands as it is a tight fit.  But if you like the game and enjoyed the character (even with her small outfit) you should pick one up.
Nice scent not to strong. I spay a bit on in the morning and it last. I really like the scent.

Everything I would expect from a Hallmark Keepsake Ornament. It is cute and since my daughter is a Frozen fan, she loves the little Olaf. All she wants to do is play with it. I have to remind her that it is an ornament. It is well designed and well made. I am very happy with it.

Very tasty to my dog. This is for larger dogs, but I do have a chihuahua, and although a crunchy treat, it can be broken into smaller pieces by hand if needed, so if you have a combination of both large and smaller dogs, don't worry, just back it into smaller pieces for the smaller dogs. My dog loved it.

It is a nice durable leash, short but not short. The leash I had before was really long and could make thing difficult to control my dog. It is well made and the handle is padded so it is comfortable in my hand or around my wrist.

Lots of information. Well designed for the age group. It is definitely something that kids can grow into, starting by just looking at pictures, and leading into actually reading the information. It is well organized with an index and glossary. My daughter enjoys reading it.

Easy to read. Has of interesting information through the out to make you think and get different thoughts on what you might be reading at the time. There are even topics of debate so that you can do as a group or by yourself. A great study bible.

To start with, put it together from the top to the bottom and then carefully turn it over. If you start from the bottom up, you will not be able to attach the top level.After stating that, it is fairly easy to put together. Just be careful with the latter, the metal attachment that you put the fastener through to attach to the cat condo and that metal piece has two fasteners that pulled out.Once put together, there was a bit of disagreement between the cats and dogs as to who it belonged to. We put some treats and cat food on it. The cats were towards the top eating, one dog climbed on the second shelf eating any food or trees found. My mom put the cat's bed on the bottom shelf and one of the other dogs claimed it.  Instead of the hanging shelf at the top, I put the hammock there so there was room at the bottom for the bed, and I was sure if she would like the shelf to move.

Ideal for in front of a window. This is probably ideal more for a single cat. It is ideal more for lounging around on the top level or in the hide away, or looking out a window.It was fairly easy to put together except the two ropes were a little difficult to get securely tightened at each end. Other than that, it was easy and is very secure for a cat to climb on.I put some cat treats and some catnip though out and Mama kitty and her two kittens did enjoy exploring for treats.

It was fairly easy to assemble. All you need is an Allen wrench, which is included with the fasteners. My two little kittens enjoy playing on it. I hide treats and they go looking for them. It does give them a work out climbing all over it. I have it next to a window, so they will sometimes take a sunny nap on it.

This is a very nice and sturdy cat condo. I have 2 two-month old kittens (brothers) . They are of course at that age the are into everything and exploring. They LOVE this cat condo. They are all over it exploring and playing. The very top, I think is still a bit high for them yet since I haven't seen them there, but like I said, they are still only 2 months old. They love the ramp at the bottom level.It was fairly easy to put together, the scratch posts were labeled with numbers at the ends, it would had been helpful if the rest were labeled, but can still be done. I needed a step stool to get the very top on.
I really enjoy this. It does work well with frying bacon in the oven. It is durable and holds up to cooking the bacon in the oven.
Nice size. Since my daughter and I enjoy fishing, these make a good size to put fish in after we clean them then freeze. They are durable and hold up to putting the fish in.
It works well and fits my lens very well and securely. I have use a lot of filters as a photographer and this is a good quality filter. I am very pleased with it.

I break this into 1/4 pieces for my dog to chew. He isn't excited about it but he does take it. I did pick up a different brand up at the store that was the same dosage, and tried it and my dog will only take it if I put it in cheese. So not having to use chews is nice, ok he doesn't scarf it down but he at least takes it without to much complaint. In just under a week, he also seems to be walking a bit better too. So over all I am pleased with it.

Works well and easy to use. If you ever tried to do anything with a dog's mouth, you know it is no fun. This makes it easy, just add it to the water when you fill the water bowl. It also works well as a breath freshener. I love it.
Nice cups and hold up to use. It holds 18 oz which is a good size for any party.
My cat really enjoys this. She is a mama of two kittens and the kittens are now eating on their own and they seem to really like it as well. The kittens seem to be able to handle it as well.
My cat really enjoys this. She is a mama of two kittens and the kittens are now eating on their own and they seem to really like it as well. The kittens seem to be able to handle it as well.
Tastes good and filling. It does make a delicious snack.
Good strong bags, exactly what I expected from Hefty. It does hold a lot of trash and doesn't tear easily.
It is easy to take. Nice if you don't like pills. You can take it as a powder or pour it into a gloss or bottle of water. It did work on my headache.
Nice stapler. It works well. It is easy to put the staples in and holds up to stapling. It will go through a decent amount of paper.

Each of these smell really nice. The lavender helps me relax at night. They do help my skin feel clean and soft. My daughter and I enjoys liked the fact that it can be used a bubble bath besides as a shower gel.
The bites were a little bigger than expected but my 13lb chihuahua doesn't seem to have a problem with it. He eats all his food so it apparently tastes good to him.

It works really well. It had a bit of a charge out of the box, so I was able to use it right away, but would still suggest changing it to get a full charge. It gave me a good shave. I am very happy with it.

It works really well. It had a bit of a charge out of the box, so I was able to use it right away, but would still suggest changing it to get a full charge. It gave me a good shave. I am very happy with it.

My little puppy loves playing with this. It is durable enough to put with rough playing and tug a war. My daughter also loves using it to play with our puppy.  It is cute and has a lot of spots for us and and the dog to grap onto and hold while playing.
According to my cat, this food tastes good, personally I haven't tried it. My dog also tried some when I wasn't looking and he claims it tastes good too. It is a nice healthy food.
I like these. They give me a close shave. I'm happy with how they hold up.  They don't irritate my legs. I am satisfied with how they work.
What can I say since I have not actually eaten it? My dog says it tastes great. He eats it when I put it down. It seems health and easy for him to eat

Even though this is reduced calorie it had an exceptionally good taste. Really sweeter than expected and reminded me of ketchup taste from burger king. My family didn't know the difference, until they read the packets.

If you like okra cooked any way, you should really enjoy this snack. If you prefer fried breaded okra however, this will amaze and satisfy you totally. I love it. It is the closest EVER to fried okra. There is just a hint of sweetness, almost as an aftertaste but not enough to overwhelm your senses. I could not resist eating a whole bag after I opened it. Slightly crisp and crunchy and delicious.

Just love this pillow. It just arrived and I want to keep running my hands all over it. It is very soft. I know it's not real velvet, but it sure looks and feels like it. And it is an officially licensed product. I really don't care that the stitching in one corner where it was filled does not match the all around stitching since I don't suffer from OCD or narcissism. It does state HAND SPONGE to wash or clean. Although I will just be tying mine up in a pillow case and adding to a gentle cycle load in my washer. Always wash my pillows this way.

These are not to be trusted. They are not actually 3mil thick. They are not name brand and are cheaply made generic. If you expect performance, buy Husky. If filling half way with packages of marshmallow peeps made them rip, then they are useless. Plus holding one up to a light source proves the quality. You can see right thru them. You are wasting your money. Spend the few extra dollars and get Husky brand.

I should have known this would not be diecast for the price. I give it 2 stars because it brought a smile to my autistic son's face. But since it is 99% plastic he will be frowning before the week is over. If it last that long. It is so cheaply made, that parts broke taking it out of the package. Junk. Period.

This had a huge hunk of cheap silver and black weld on it. I am concerned of the product safety for food use. I did not order something I thought was made in the back yard of some Junk yard. This is definately not a product approved or regulated for quality and safety control for use in food preparation.

I did not enjoy this book at all. It seemed not much effort was put in to making it come alive for serious Scottish Highlander fans. A 21rst century girl swims off the coast of a castle ruin, makes a wish and dolphins pop her up in 15th century Scotland wearing a wet suit. The medieval highlander rescues her and she tells him she is from the future. He accepts it point blank, and says fine good I know now let's take our clothes off, make babies and get married. And that is exactly what happened. There was no romance, suspense, or challenge. Even the enemy of the highlander accepted the time travel future story instantly without question since the girl was his medieval daughter unknown to him, and taken to the future by his mother because she was preemie baby. It was actually a very dull lifeless story. Most of the language was confusing. One minute the medieval guy is using modern slang, the next he acts like he never heard the words.

Nasty & Hot. Cinnamon and Nutmeg in chili? No thank you. The description states this is mild and contains no cayenne. It is not true. This ruined a good pot of chili. I had already used 4 cans each of tomatoes and beans and 3lb meat while preparing my chili. Unexpected company and adding another can of beans and tomatoes made me dig for a bit more seasoning. Realizing I was out of my normal recipe packets I remembered this bottle recently arrived from amazon. My mixture was already weak without the extra cans.  So grabbing it up, I thought boy we are gonna have some good chili now. I should have left it alone, weak, and at least consumable. The flavor was nauseating. There was no touch of chili flavor after adding about 3/4 tsp to my huge pot. I don't know what was worse, the cinnamon nutmeg flavor or the heat. Needless to say, I was forced to throw it out and send someone for takeout.
DO NOT buy unless you have a JAPANESE DS system!Yall should know buy now you can't play JP games in US DS's.I hope the US version comes out soon because I am too lazy to learn to read japanese.

MANGO SALSA REVIEWNasty. Rotten soured pineapple gone bad taste. No salsa flavor detected. Smells like Windex or 409 spray cleaner. Actually taste like it too. Yuk! I wasted my money.WAsABI GINGER ReviewNo wasabi hardly. Definately no ginger. Bit too hard for kettle crunch. Smells and tastes like the old garlic kettle chips that used to be available. Just a little bit spicy AFTeR you eat it. More like a pepper burn.Cappacunio REVIEWSorry i could not get it past my lips from the smell. It was nauseating. I like coffee, but this was too weird and overwhelming. I gagged. My daughter says the taste is worse than the smell.Bacon Cheddar Mac n Cheese ReviewSorry there is yet to be a chip to taste like mac n cheese. There is a smell, but really no bacon flavor. Then the fake bacon flavor overwhelms any mac n cheese. Smells like beefstick. Reminds me of sourcream n cheddar chips already on the market by lays. Looks like them too, except for a microscopic black specks here and there.

I was very skeptical about this laundry detergent when first purchased at dollar tree for one buck. But after several uses I realized it is as good or better than all the no brand detergents. It is not tide mind you but it was well worth the dollar. I am a faithful tide user for truly dirty laundry. However, when my local discount dollar stores started carrying this product in other formulas and scents I had to try them. The purple bottle is the best. It leaves your clothes smelling like fresh sunshine and spring. I stocked up on it immediately. One cap for normal loads, and 2 for heavily soiled items. I know it sounds weird, but the purple bottle worked the best. And for 1 dollar you can not loose much. Besides this company makes some exceptional cleaning products. The yellow cleaner will remove permanent marker and gum or sticker residue that is decades old.

Half pants? Well at least that part is half true. This is just a thin strip of fabric that ties at your waist like an apron. Almost. At least an apron might wrap around you somewhat. This item does not. When tied on and you kneel everything between your waist and knees is stretched, flopped, sagged and anything you have in the pockets pokes you or jabs you. It is more trouble than it is worth. It is useless against mud or water or any type of wet soil.Save yourself the headache and just wear your old jeans or pilfer your husbands wardrobe. You will be more comfortable and able to move around.

When you realize how big these packages are and how much you get it is well worth it. If you are a Fruity Pebbles lover, this will make your day and perhaps your week or month. I hate the tiny sized boxes from my local grocery store. They are expensive and never enough product in each one. I can almost finish one box in a sitting. But here, I get 2 gigantic boxes which contain 2 of the larger sized ones each. There is more than enough for the whole family, plus the ease of arriving at your door. Never another break-neck emergency trip out to get more if you have this much.Buy now, and save time and money and be much happier when they arrive. 4 bags of the pure edible WoW factor.

I used to love Mr salty pretzels. They were so light and thin and airy with the perfect amount of salt. At times u could easily break them with just your lips. But these pretzels were too big, too hard, and way too dry. They hurt my mouth and teeth. I am aware the box shows large size pretzel sticks. I knew this before ordering a case. But I trusted the Mr salty name along with the quality expected from kraft. I was disappointed by both. There is no resemblance to Mr salty pretzels in either taste or texture. The cheese was runny and oily like the cheap imitation spreads you can get at discount stores. It literally runs off your pretzel. The quality is way below what I expected from this company. At least with the other kraft handisnacks and crackers you can divide your little square of cheese evenly with your red stick and it holds form. This cheese is soupy and runny.

This is not a baby sized mouse even though it is a bit on the small size. Perfect for the average female or small child. It works perfectly with windows 7 so I am pleased. Just plug n play instantly. The lights are an added bunch of fun. Very cool to in the dark. The mouse is not actually glow in the dark. It is the lights that make it glow. They are so cute. I bought me a few extras for spares.

I really wanted to like this. The taste was way off for the chives. There really was no flavor at all. The mix was too fine and made more of a soupy texture than what I am used to from this company. (And that is mixed according to directions) They are much smaller than the ones available in our local stores. About half the size.
This is the best macoroni ever. You get 12 boxes. 8 Boxes of spirals and 4 Spongebob. Best deal ever.
This is a very hard to find pudding. It is so good. Can't believe the great deal and a wonderful taste.

Delicious Jello and a very cute anime style Piggy Bank. :DIt comes with 4 different yummy flavors:- Grape- Strawberry- Green Apple- PineappleEach jello has real pieces of fruit in it. (small pieces)The jellos are small and easy to use in lunches, picnics, etc.You don't even need a spoon, it's very easy to squeeze the jello into your mouth.The perfect snack.It has english, japanese and spanish (I think.) writing on the label.It also has seaweed extract.Now for the bank, it's plastic, nice size and has a very cute face and screw-on hat lid, perfect for kids.(Mine was a boy version with a blue hat.)This item is grate for kids. ^^

I wish I had paid closer attention to the picture of this item. I purchased it to replace a metal floor register that for perfectly. This one does not fit that well. It is actually made smaller and slides around. Besides it does not come with any way to secure it. There are no pre drilled holes. Drilling your own weakens the cheap plastic. The air outlet is not angled. There are tiny 1/2 vertical squares. The tiny strips for air control on the bottom are almost 1/2 in wide if that. You need a very small knife blade or similar object to ajust them. There is no room to do this with your fingers. So the air control flaps are useless on the bottom if the outlet is vertical. The air is going to rise straight up no matter what you do.If you close the vents flaps and do not secure this somehow, then it will be blown right out of your hole. It weighs next to nothing.

My family definitely needs humidifiers during the winter months. Our house gets so dry and at night, these are necessities. I've been trying it out and I'm really impressed. A full tank will last more than one night. But I do recommend changing the water often so you don't cycle old water that has been sitting there.I like that it has the option for using Vicks pads. That's perfect for when anyone who is stuffy-nosed. The projections is perfect for a child's room.  Overall, this is a perfect humidifier and I highly recommend it!

"A Step Toward Falling" is Cammie McGovern's second book for YA readers. Once again, she covers a topic about people with disabilities. This is still a topic that a lot of books don't address, so I think she has found her niche."A Step Toward Falling" was a relatively fast read. It has characters that are not perfect but I liked them all anyway. Although, out of three main characters, Emily was my least favorite. I didn't like her the way I did other characters. I also really liked that the main focus of this book was not about romance. Yes, there is romance but it doesn't consume this book the way it does in other YA stories.Overall, it was a great story and a great second effort

This is a really great headset. It fits comfortably on my head and is easy to adjust. The sound quality when listening is really great. Everything sounded clear. The microphone works well too. When I tried it out, my voice came through clear with no static.  I also really like that it has a long cord. It means that it would work for a variety of things, especially for gaming.I would highly recommend this headphones set!

Urban Dictionary is a fun game. Do not play with or around children as the game can get a bit naughty. But it's a lot of fun. The rules are pretty easy to understand and if you play a lot of games, then you'll see elements from other games in the Urban Dictionary game. I had a fun evening with some people playing this game. There was a lot of laughing, blushing (I blush easily) and "Oh my god" and "I'm so embarrassed".Definitely a great game for holiday get-togethers (again for the adults only) or a weekend party.

My bedroom tends to get very dry in the winter, so having a humidifier is a must for me.  I really like this humidifier. It's easy to set up and extremely quiet to run. I like that it can hold a lot of water and that I don't have to worry about running out if I run it for a longer period of time. I also like that it has slots for scented pads. Using the Vicks scented pad is great for when you're sick. The only bad thing about this humidifier is that you must buy a new filter for it. But that's the only con I can think of for this unit.

This is the second fragrance that I've used from Burberry and this is just as lovely as the first one. Burberry Touch comes in a cool box that is unique and the bottle itself is simple yet beautiful. I love the smell, I could smell the woody elements in it. Two small spritzes (one one each arm) were enough to last most of the day. It might be on the stronger side for some people, so I don't recommend going overboard with spraying yourself-a little will go a long way.Overall, I'm very happy with this perfume.

I've smelled Burberry Brit before in department stores but I've never gotten a bottle before now. I really love it. It comes a nice box and the bottle is so beautiful. It looks gorgeous on my shelf.The scent is lovely. You don't need a lot to be able to smell it. I never want to overpower people with my perfume and so I would recommend no more than two sprays and it's strong enough but not too strong. The smell is lovely and can go from day to night.I love this and I think it is my new favorite perfume.

When I first started "Daughters unto Devils", I wasn't sure how much I would like it. But as I started to read, the more I started to like it. It's a little confusing at the beginning but the more you read, the more you start to get it.Amy Lukavics has done really well in building a spooky atmosphere. I could picture the cabin with the awful surprise in it. I'm glad that Amy didn't attempt to do one of those books with the obviously fake photographs that a lot of YA horror writers are doing now and letting the readers imagine it for themselves. The scary aspect starts off slow but all of a sudden-it turns really spooky. I read this in my bed at night and by the end, I kind of got the creeps.The book was a super fast read for me-I read it in less than a day. In fact, I stayed up later than I should have so I could finish it. It is perfect reading for stormy nights or a chilly autumn day. If you like spooky stories, you are going to love this book. Highly recommended!

If you or someone you know loves Star Wars, then this is the perfect thing for any Star Wars fan. This light saber is based off the new Stars Wars villain Kylo Ren. My nine year old nephew loves to play with the light sabers and he loved playing with this one. It's easy to figure out how to use it. It's pretty cool how it lights up, so it makes playing in a darkened setting more fun. It has the light saber sounds that previous light sabers make. My nephew likes to play hard in light saber battles and seems pretty durable so far.I do wish there was a clip at the handle part because my nephew likes to clip light sabers to his pants to be like the real characters but other than that, it's pretty awesome. Any Star Wars fan of any age would probably love this saber. Perfect for play, display, or part of a Halloween costume.

I thought this would be a fun thing to have for when my family gets together. And it is definitely fun.We played this outside, which is great because you can make it more challenging by having the boards further apart. But it will also work well inside for rainy or snowy days.The only problem is that it is not a very sturdy game. The boards are flimsy feeling and while they haven't broke yet, they feel like it won't take much to break them. It's like I'm afraid to use it because I'm afraid that they'll break, It's a shame because it's a great game.

I had heard some really good things about Adi Alsaid as an author and his first book. I haven't read that book yet but I thought I would give this book a try.Overall, I thought the book was just okay. I liked the first half of the book more than the second half. The first half kept me interested but I found myself getting tired and a little annoyed with Dave and especially Julia. The wishy-washy actions of the two of them not knowing whether they should be in a romantic relationship was irritating to deal with. But the writing was still really well done. I also liked that Dave and Julia watched the sunset the way that Jesse and Celine did in the one of my favorite movies, "Before Midnight".So I didn't hate the book but I just didn't love it as much as I hoped to.

I used to have a Play-Doh set slightly similar to this when I was a kid. When I saw that they have a new version of the barber shop, I knew that my niece and nephews would love to play with it. I was right as it was a hit right from the start.With this kit you get:-One chair (in two separate pieces)-6 mini cans of Play-Doh-3 characters:a man, a woman, and a child-2 hair molds (a woman's hairstyle and a mohawk-play tools (including play scissors and pretend razors)This is a pretty easy set to set up. Just connect the stand with the chair, stick some Play-Doh inside one of the characters, slide the character in place on the chair, and turn the crank to see their hair grow.The kids (and I will admit, me too) had a lot of fun with this. They all liked seeing the hair grow and then cutting it off. Any negative things of the set is that there are a lot of places where the Play-Doh gets stuck. The dough doesn't come out of the person completely, so we had to use toothpicks to get it out. The Play-Doh also tends to get stuck in the chair. But the fun that the kids have outweighs the pain of clean-up.This is a great addition to your Play-Doh collection.

"Those Secrets We Keep" is a pretty good summer read about women's friendships.The women in the story-Sloane, Georgina, and Hilary are typical chick-lit archetypes. There's the wild woman, the bored wife, and the practical one. At times, I had a hard time liking all the characters. But even with those typical characters, I still enjoyed the story, overall. I love reading summer oriented stories in the summer. As a child, I used to visit my grandparent's house on a lake and so I loved the lake setting. The three women all come on their getaway hoping that their lives will get better. Does it happen? You'll have to read the book to find out.Overall, it's a pretty typical chicklit/women's fiction story but it was still pretty enjoyable. It's a great book to take on your vacation.

These potholders are okay but not the best that I've used. I really like the blue color of them. The nautical blue color is dark enough so you can't see a lot of stains if you happen to drip something on them. And if you happen to have a kitchen theme, these would probably fit in with most themes.The potholders look nice but they are definitely thinner than I would like. I used it to carry a hot bowl of green bean casserole from the oven to the dinner table and I could definitely feel the heat by the time I reached the table. That's not such a good thing because you could burn your hands or potentially drop the hot items on the floor and maybe on yourself. So definitely be mindful of the temperature of things before you use these. But they are comfortable to hold and are big enough for my hands to not touch the hot pans.So overall, these are just okay but nowhere near perfect.

"Paperweight" is definitely not a light read. At times I had a hard time picking up the book because it would make me feel a little depressed after reading it. But I stuck with it and it was worth it to reach the end.At the beginning of the book, nothing is right in Stevie's world. Her mother left her, her brother has died, she has a drinking problem, and she has an eating disorder. The book follows Stevie from her first day in the eating disorder rehab that her father made her go to and the journey that she takes while there. Her therapist helps her see that maybe she doesn't need to disappear into nothingness.Like I said at the beginning, this is a heavy read. But there are so many issues that Stevie faces that may touch a nerve in a reader's heart. It may not be an easy read for some but I think it's definitely worth reading.

This is a really, really great hair dryer. It comes with a great set of tools to help you as you dry and style your hair:-the hair dryer comes in a cool greenish color. It has a high and low setting. The temperature settings are cool, warm, hot and a cool shot button. The cord is long enough for me. It also has a loop near the bottom so that you can hang it on something if that's how you store your hair dryer.-A conditioning ring. You attach it to the hair dryer to help moisturize your hair. I've never seen something like this before. I've only used the ring once but my hair did seem rather soft after I dried it. One ring should last you about three months, depending on how much you use it. It will last longer if you don't use it every day.-An air concentrator attachment. This will help if you want straighter hair-An air diffuser attachment. This will help give you volume in your hair-A hair brush. These is a great plus for the hair dryer set. It's a pretty nice hair brush. it's not really cheap feeling at all. I like it a lot.Overall, this is a great hair dryer. It does seem like it's a little more expensive than some of the other hair dryers but it comes with so much and I think it's worth it. Highly recommended!

This is truly a fantastic hair dryer. It has a high and low settings. The high setting is what I use the most. It dries my hair in about five minutes, which is great. For temperature control, it has a hot, warm, cool, and a cool shot button. It's a pretty light hair dryer, my arms don't get tired at all when I hold it. It also has a comfortable grip. I don't have a problem with the cord length but I'm right by an outlet when I dry my hair, so it's usually not a problem for me.Overall, this is a great hair dryer and definitely worth getting.

I'm a big fan of "The Lost Generation" and especially a big fan of F. Scott Fitzgerald and Zelda Fitzgerald. I had read a little about how they were friends with Gerald and Sara Murphy and the couple was the inspiration for "Tender is the Night". So I was eager to give "Villa America" a try.The book takes real events and people and weaves in fictional scenes and people. The book starts when Gerald, Sara, and the fictional Owen were children. The book covers them growing up and Gerald and Sara's relationship. For me, the book was just okay. There were some interesting parts and it is well-written. But some parts just dragged and I found myself losing interest in the story.Overall, the story was okay but the slowness of the story made it hard to really enjoy.

I know they probably aren't meant to, but these will not replace good old plain paper towels any time soon. These are paper towels with dried Dawn soap in them. When you either wet the paper towel with water or put the towel on a wet surface, it will activate the soap. Then everything becomes soapy.I suppose these are good for wiping down a counter but it does make it extra soapy, so you may need to re-wipe it down with something that doesn't have soap in it. They are also good for washing a dish or two. I do like them for when rinse raw meat (like pork chops or chicken) in the sink. That way I can use these to clean the sink and not have to worry about all those pesky germs that you get when raw meat touches your sink or counters.But the soap smell is a little strong. You also have to put these somewhere else or buy another holder to put these on and make sure no one gets confused that these are not a plain paper towel. You don't want anyone using these to put food on when they cook things in the microwave or to use them to dry your hands or face.

Why did I wait so long to read this book? I've debated about reading "How to Love" for a long time now but I finally decided to give it a try and I'm so happy that I did."How to Love" is all about Reena and Sawyer. The story goes back and forth from After-when Reena has a baby and Sawyer is back in town after a couple years away and Before-which covers the beginnings of their relationship up until Sawyer leaves. While I read the book, I was both in love and equally annoyed with both of the characters. Sawyer is both party swoon-worthy yet you know he's kind of bad for Reena and Reena can be both a great character but so kind of needy when it comes to Sawyer. But I loved their story."How to Love" was an extremely fast read for me. I read it in less than a day as it just sucked me in and I just wanted to keep reading it. I figured out what the outcome was going to be but it didn't make it any less enjoyable. Katie Cotugno has a definite talent for writing and her second book, "99 Days" is sitting on my TBR (To Be Read) shelf.I loved this book and I would recommend it not just to YA fans but to anyone.

"Life By Committee" is about a kind of lonely girl who finds an online community where she can tell her secrets to. Tabitha was dumped from her previous friends after her body developed and the guys in school started looking at her differently. She got a reputation around school even though she hasn't done anything and still is that sort of nerdy girl who loves book. She has a flirtation going on with Joe but Joe is currently dating someone. Tabitha finds the Life by Committee, who dare her to do things she wouldn't normally do. But is good for her or will it lead her down a path that she can't come from? You'll have to read the book to find out.Overall, I liked this book. Tabitha is a likable main character, even if she doesn't always do what's right. I felt bad for as she kind of turned into the school punching bag a little bit, all because of rumors that her former best friend spread about her. Tabitha has a passion for books and I always love reading books where the characters are passionate about reading. The Life By Committee concept is interesting and is something that I could see existing in the real world. It shows how easy it is to be anonymous, yet the people behind the computers control our lives a little.The book kept me interested all the way through and was a relatively quick read. I would definitely recommend giving this one a try.

This is a really excellent set of cooking utensils that are made for grilling but will help in the kitchen, no matter what you're cooking.You get three utensils in this set- a fork, tongs, and a spatula. They have extra long handles, which is great so you don't get too close to the grill's heat. The spatula is very sturdy. It makes picking up and holding foods that are heavier really easy. The tongs are my favorite tool. They can grab onto small stuff but hold thicker food as well. The fork works well too. The grips on each utensil are really nice. Each tool is easy and comfortable to hold.Overall, I'm extremely pleased with this set and I highly recommend using them for your grilling/cooking.

I was curious about "Those Girls" but a little apprehensive because some people haven't been saying the best things about it but I decided to bite the bullet and give it a try. I actually didn't hate it. I didn't love it either but it kept me interested."Those Girls" are Alexandra, Mollie, and Veronica, who are the popular girls in an all-girl school. Regina George from the film "Mean Girls" is nothing compared to what these girls do, particularly to each other. They are best friends but they have no problem on backstabbing each other. You probably aren't going to love any one character but at times, I could feel sympathy for each girl. Out of all three, I probably liked Alex the best. Veronica and Mollie are a mess. Mollie is the meanest out of the three and Veronica is the "easy" girl in the school.The book follows the girls throughout the whole of their junior year. There's lots of partying involved. Yes, there is a lot of swearing, drug use, and sexual situations. But really, it's a very realistic book that shows what some teens do. If you are a teen or even if you aren't now, I'm sure that everyone knows people like "Those Girls" and their partying ways.This isn't, by any means, the best book that I've read but it kept my interest in what messed up stuff that the girls did to each other.

Nowadays, it's absolutely necessary to have a shredder at your home or business. If you're looking for a shredder, this is a great one for you. It's very tall, so it's able to hold a lot of waste before you need to change it. That could be great for businesses who may shred more things than the average household. I put in several pieces of paper at once and it shredded them easily. I tried out an old gift card in place of a credit card and that too, shredded with no problem.This is definitely a great shredder and I highly recommend it.

This is a super fun Play-Doh set for any Disney Princess fan.You get four mini Play-Doh colors. Two of these have glitter in them. You get three castle facades-one for Ariel, one for Cinderella, and a Rapunzel one. The Rapunzel one is fun as you can make her "hair" grow. The Ariel and Cinderella ones have decorations on it that come from each of their stories.  They also have a skirt mold and you can decorate their Play-Doh skirts in multiple ways. This set also comes with some of the usual Play-Doh tools that help your playing.The glitter in the Play-Doh does get on your hands but that's easily washed off.Set up is easy and it provides a ton of fun. Highly recommended!

Being a fan of Stephen Sondheim's work, especially "Company", I immediately got the connection of the title of "Everybody Rise" to Mr. Sondheim's song, "The Ladies Who Lunch".The book takes place from 2006 up until right before disaster hits in 2008. Evelyn is a daughter of a new money lawyer and a social climbing mother. Right from the first chapter, you see Evelyn's mother pushing her to be better and get into the in-crowd of New York society. Working for People Like Us (A fake Facebook for rich people), Evelyn pushes her way into the group of elite New York. Things escalate as Evelyn tries to fit in with people like Camilla Rutherford, who is considered the top tier in the New York socialite world. But things start to fall apart when Evelyn reaches too high.I really don't know how I feel about "Everybody Rise". I had a harder time getting into the book at the beginning and that made it hard to want to pick it up. As the storyline picked up, it was easier to read. But then I also don't know how I feel about Evelyn. She's relatively likable in the beginning but turns slightly heinous in the middle and it's hard to like her after that. At one point she became so unlikable that I couldn't wait for her to get the comeuppance she deserved. She will do anything to stay on the top and almost become better than Camilla. At one point, I thought she should be put in the mental hospital because she is so far gone.The ending of the book is something you would expect but was satisfactory. I didn't hate the book at all. It's just as great as I was hoping it would be.

I had really high hopes for this novel, especially after seeing the glowing reviews. But alas, I just could not get into this book.I really tried to love it but it just wasn't working for me, so I gave up about half way through. I felt like the relationship of Juliet and Lucas was so strange. I didn't really like either character. Lucas comes off as a stalker in the beginning and Juliet becomes more and more unlikable as the book went on. The story was just dragging and nothing much seemed to be happening and I decided to call it quits on this book.I wish I could be one of those people who loved this book but unfortunately, I'm not one of them. It's a shame because I so wanted to love this book.

I was a little nervous to start this book because of some of the more negative reviews. But I decided to give it a try and "The Heiresses" is really not that bad at all.I won't go into major details about what the story is about but the gist of the story is that the Saybrooks are a major family who is rich from diamonds. Someone murdered a Saybrook cousin, Poppy, and the other cousins try and figure out who killed Poppy. At first I wasn't sure who was who and had to refer to the family tree that's at the beginning of the book, but I caught on pretty quickly and it was pretty easy to tell them apart. Even though none of the heiresses are completely likable, they all do things that are bad, I still kind of liked them. The mystery is pretty well-done. There are a lot of people who could be the culprit and I didn't know who the murderer was until they were revealed.The book was a fast read for me, I read it in about a day and a half. I've never read a Sara Shepard novel (crazy, right?) but I'm a fan now. A perfect summer beach read.

This is a truly fantastic YA novel. It's probably one of my favorite YA novels that I've read and just a great novel period.Plenty of reviews recount the plot, so I don't feel I need to explain it. But I thoroughly enjoyed the story. Paige is a really great main character. She's extremely likable, you want things to work out for her.  Max is fantastic as well. I think I have a little book crush on him! I loved how a lot of the characters, like Paige and Max, were book enthusiasts. Paige's group of friends routinely hang out a bookstore and they show passion for books. I love reading that in novels.The story is lovely. I loved the interweaving of loss, love, friends, and family. This is a perfect read for the summer. Highly recommended!

I've been using Swiffer products for years and have a pretty happy customer so far, so I was willing to try this new Swiffer cleaner. Putting it together is so simple and you're ready to go in no time.I do like this cleaner. My sister's dog recently stayed for a week and you would not believe how much that dog sheds. But I used this in my kitchen and it picked up a whole bunch of his hair. It looked like the dog had never been there after I was done. I like the dustpan feature of the cleaner. It's great for keeping the debris in and not floating all around your floor. Emptying is really simple too. I didn't have too much trouble moving it around, although it's not going to get into tight places.Overall, I'm pretty pleased and happy with this new Swiffer.

I love to sit outside in the summer but can't stand to be bit up by mosquitoes, so I was hoping this would rescue me from those pesky bugs.While it may not be perfect, this is still a great way to deter some mosquitoes from hanging around you. The lantern is very pretty and I like the blue glow. The lantern has an option where you can use it as a lantern only or as a lantern with the mosquito repellent working. The repellent smells nice to humans but is effective in making those bugs disappear. One pad should last for about 12 hours before you need to replace it. Hopefully replacements should be easy to find soon.Overall, I liked this product and I hope to use it often once I get more replacement pads.

These are the first headphones that I've tried that are for noise suppression, so I wasn't sure what to expect when I tried them for the first time. When I took them out the box, I put them on and noticed things got a whole lot quieter without even putting in the battery. I put the battery in and sounds like the washing machine running and birds chirping all went away. There was a definite hush. While I could still hear someone talking to me, it was muffled. I didn't really hear much in a hissing noise when I was wearing them.I listened to some music with these on and while the sound quality of the music isn't the best I've heard, it's not the worst either. Pretty average for music sound quality. The headphones fit comfortably on my head and ears. I think I could wear these for long periods of time without it making the area around my ears ache, like some headphones tend to do.The headphones come with a AAA battery and a really nice case to store the headphones in. Overall, I'm pretty satisfied with these headphones.

I had fond memories of the Glitter hair Barbie of the 1990's. She had really long hair where you could comb through Barbie's hair with glitter gel and glittery streaks behind. I was expecting this kit to be similar but alas, it was not.There are plenty of warnings on the box about what you should not do. First of all, they want you to know that the glitter and adhesive sheets are to be used on Barbie only, not on children. Also know that the glitter may stain fabrics and should not come into contact with clothing, carpet, walls, or furniture. That alone makes it a little harder to have play time with this Barbie.The glittering process is relatively easy. But the design that comes off is nothing like what is pictured on the box (but then again, how often do things in real life look like what it does on a box or tv commercial?). The glitter comes of as you move Barbie around, so the design doesn't stick around for very long. It's also messy so neat freaks should stay away from this Barbie.However, Barbie does come in a very pretty pink top with a blue sparkly skirt. She has black platform heels and a silver necklace. Her hair is long and silky and should be great for different hairdos.This sounded like a great idea in theory but just doesn't quite work like it should

I had debated about trying reading this book for awhile. It sounded intriguing and yet, strange. A girl with a feather in her lung? How weird. But in the end, I decided to bite the bullet and try the book.I was right on both accounts, "Magonia" is both intriguing and strange. You got to be all in for this novel as there ships in the sky and bird people. But if you stick with it, you'll see what a beautiful novel this is. The writing is fantastic and beautiful. The author did a really great job in building this new type of world.  And I wasn't sure that I would like Aza, the main character, but I ended up loving her. I will definitely be reading the second novel in this series."Magonia" is a fantastic book and I would definitely recommend giving it a try.

This is a very pretty pendant and necklace. The necklace chain is a very thin and delicate chain. It's on the shorter side, so if you like longer chains,  beware. The pendant is a small key with a heart inside. The picture shows a silver chain but the one that I received was gold. It's still a very pretty necklace.  It's super delicate and make sure that it's fastened on right because it fell off  But overall, it's still a lovely necklace and would make a great gift for someone you love.

This is a super cute Barbie set. I absolutely love the bike that Barbie has and wish that I had something like this when I was younger. The bike works great and girls will have fun pushing Barbie along on her bike. It's easy to put her feet in the pedals and have them stay in.As you push her, Barbie pedals her bike.The dogs are adorable on their skateboards and a great addition to this set. Barbie comes in a lovely striped tank top, painted on pants, black boots, and a removable helmet.This is a great addition to your Barbie collection!

It was a dark and stormy night when I started this book. Perfect atmosphere for reading "The Rules", a scary thriller of a book. The book is all about a group of high school kids who join together for a scavenger hunt organized by August, a boy with a taste of revenge. Everything starts out fun but soon the group realizes that a killer is after each of them. Is it August or is it someone else with revenge on their mind? You'll have to read the book to find out.I've seen my share of scary/slasher flicks and while I'm not obsessed with them, I do enjoy watching them once in awhile. Reading this book was exactly like watching a scary movie. It's in the vein of the Scream series or "I Know What You Did Last Summer". It definitely reminded me of a horror movie from the 90's. There were lots of twists and turns and I had to keep reading to find out what was going to happen next. The authors did a great job with building the tension and with the atmosphere. I could actually picture the location and fog in my head. There are quite a few characters in the book, but it's pretty easy to remember them all. Plus, it's not really a spoiler when I say that they don't all end up alive at the end of the book."The Rules" is a fast read, I read it in a little over a day. If you like horror movies or other scary novels, you should like this book.

This Anna doll is a great doll for any Frozen's fan collection. Especially if Anna is your favorite character.Anna comes in her green coronation gown. The skirt is removable but the top part (the sleeves on her arms, the bodice, and the necklace) are all painted and molded on. So if you wanted to put different outfits on the doll, it does limit you somewhat. That's the reason for my four stars instead of five.  The outfit is pretty, though. There are some sparkles on her bodice and in her pink crown. She comes with removable pink shoes. If you press the necklace, a portion of the song "For the First Time in Forever" plays. It actually plays quite a bit and is great for reenacting the scene.Overall, she's a very pretty doll and any Frozen fan will love her

"Lola Carlyle's 12-Step Romance" definitely sounded like an intriguing tale to me. Lola is the daughter of a famous filmmaker and a famous actress and you think that she's the typical spoiled celebuspawn brat who gets everything. She goes to rehab pretending to be an alcoholic after her sometimes best friend tells her that the rehab that she's at is practically a trip to the spa.From that description, Lola doesn't sound very likable but I found that she really is likable. She's funny, I found myself cracking a smile or laughing a  little while reading. The romance story is typical and not a surprise to the reader but I still enjoyed reading it. The main love interest is written well and I loved their scenes together. The story is both light and heavy. Being in a rehab will obviously bring some serious moments into the book.The book was a fast read and great for summer reading. Highly recommended!

This is a really excellent snorkel set. I don't know much about the pricing of snorkel sets, but it seems like a good buy for what you get.In this set, you get a mask, snorkel, and fins. They all come in a really nice mesh bag. That's great so that even if you're equipment is wet when you put them in the bag, they will still dry out. The fins are easy to put on and you can tighten them as needed. The mask works really well and I didn't have any leakage problems. The snorkel is great too.Overall, a great set and highly recommended!

I was excited to try this pizza oven. I have a hard time using the regular oven when I try heating up frozen pizzas as the pizza tends to curl up and burn, so I had high hopes for this pizza oven.I was kind of disappointed, though. I was kind of surprised on how small the oven is. It was harder to fit in a pizza. The oven gets extremely hot all over and I did end up burning my hand as I tried to get the pizza out. However, my pizza did cook pretty evenly and there was no curling on the sides of the pizza. It took longer than 5 minutes to cook the pizza but it was still pretty fast. My pizza was done in about 10 minutes.  Putting the pizza ove together was pretty easy and it didn't take that long to do.Overall, I wouldn't say that this is the best pizza oven out there as there are some flaws but it's not the worst either

I'm a huge, huge Sophie Kinsella fan. But I have to tell you, my faith in her books was a little shaken when I was disappointed by "Wedding Night" and "Shopaholic to the Stars" (I'm still a little traumatized by what Becky has become), so I was both excited yet leery to reading "Finding Audrey", which is her first foray into YA. But thankfully, I absolutely loved this book.This book introduces us to Audrey. Audrey is 14 years old and has experienced something awful because some of her classmates. The book skirts around what happened to her but it was bad enough that the girls got expelled from their school. And Audrey suffers from depression and severe anxiety  that prevents her from speaking to anyone who isn't in her immediate family or her therapist. She even wears dark sunglasses because she can't bear to have people look in her in the eye. Audrey has a kooky, crazy family. Her mother is a little nutty and is forever trying to get Audrey's brother, Frank, to stop playing video games. Frank's friend Linus, comes to the house and eventually Audrey starts opening up to him and her world begins to expand a little.I really enjoyed reading this book, so much so that I started it around 1 in the afternoon and finished it by 5 in the evening. It's a really quick and enjoyable read. Audrey is an extremely likable character.  I liked that there were Sophie's patented comic touches all over the book. The scenes between Frank and Audrey's mom were always good to lighten the mood.
