The three authors have brilliantly co-opted a great story that I am sure will resonate with a lot of women, as the touch on subjects & scenarios that most of us have faced at one time or another in real life.  I fell in love with all of the characters, especially Bobbi.  I could completely sympathize with her plight and dilemmas in the story.  The book kind of reminded me of the Sex In The City TV series, but with an entirely different set of personalities and escapades.  Now I dont want to give the plot away as I wouldnt want to wreck it for another reader, but if you are a fan of this type of fiction and you are looking for a great book to put on your summer reading list, then this one is a winner!  5 big stars!

This was a great book!  I simply couldnt put it down from the moment I started reading it.  I am a huge fan of epic mystery and adventure novels and tend to be very critical when analyzing and reviewing a book such as this.  But I am happy to report that this one is an absolute winner!  The storyline is so well done.  Each part of the story transitions nicely into the next making the whole saga that plays out believable.  The characters are also very colorful and well done.  I loved Captain Johnny Blacks character, along with the two main characters Danny & Marsha Jones.  Now I dont like to give away plots when I review a book, especially one as good as this one.  But if you like books of this genre, then you will absolutely fall in love with this book!

What a bone-chilling and terrifying story that will have you trembling in your shoes and gasping for breath from the moment you start reading it!  I absolutely loved it!  Joe Ireri obviously has a tremendously sinister and creative imagination to be able to write such a great suspenseful story.  His descriptive writing style really helps the characters and horror scenes come to life in your imagination.  A feat that is incredibly difficult to do in horror/suspense stories.  So hats off to the author indeed!  The storyline really flows nicely with so many twists & turns and cliff-hanger moments that you really never know what is going to happen next.  You will definitely stay engaged and anticipate each & every page all the way up to the storys great climactic ending. The only downside to this book was that it wasn't as long as I wanted it to be, as I was left wanting just a little more.  Just being honest...  All-in-all it was a great read that would recommend to anyone!  I give it 4 out of 5 stars!

I found this book to be incredibly insightful and straight to the point. It is a great resource on how to be yourself, the true YOU and how to get rid of all the false guides.  I think it's not so easy to be one's authentic self in this days and age. How many of us live our whole lives trying to be something we're not? Trying to do and say all the right things, to not mess up and try to be perfect.We all go through life wanting everyone else to be honest, real, and authentic with us... yet, how many of us are able or willing to do the same in return?  Basically, we all expect from others, what we struggle to deliver. This book  does a great job on teaching you how to get clear on who you are, what you want, and how to achieve the things you want to achieve. One of the phrases I loved is  "We need to stop imagining non-existing bridges to nowhere".  I always dream and expect things to happen that will never come.  It is because I have built the bridges to a non-existing reality.  All this must stop. We have to see ourselves and life through true eyes.  Do yourself a favor and read this book.  It will change your life!

Four great sizzling stories for the price of one.  That's what you will find in Donald Peterson's latest collection called "Escorts".  Although the theme of each story has to do with escorts, each story is completely original and unique.  And as you read through the book you will find that each story is a little more hot, steamy, and naughty the the preceding one.  Some parts of the stories will excite you, some parts will make you blush, and other parts have lots of great twists & turns to keep you interested and engaged.  The erotic dialogue and imagery is also very good as Peterson is a very descriptive writer who really gets your juices flowing.  All-in-all this is a great book that would be the perfect addition to you erotic collection.  I really loved it and I think you will too!

What a great sexy book that had me experiencing so many emotions as I read.  The author has crafted 3 great short stories between the covers of this book.  The first story was very sweet and romantic.  The other two stories are steamy with lots of twists and turns.  I really loved the author's writing style.  I also especially loved the climactic ending of the third story.  I totally sympathized with the two spouses who were being cheated on so I was completely amused with how their revenge played out. If you are looking for a fun read to put on your summer reading list then I highly recommend that you check this one out.  I give it 5 big stars!

What a great companion that helped me fill in all of the blanks and questions I had from Blake Crouchs Wayward.  This book really was a godsend as it really made me understand the complete plot and underlying meanings of this great story.  Samantha C. Allen obviously is a meticulous reader & documenter with an incredible ability to read between the lines and get to the bottom of the inner working of stories like this.  It is truly a gift that she has and I for one am extremely jealous.  She really leaves no stone unturned.  After reading thorough this great companion, all of my questions have been answered and I have a complete understanding of the entire storyline, including the character motivations and roles in the story.  If only every great novel had a sidekick like this available, the literary world would be a much better place!  I give this one 5 big stars!!!!

What a tremendously in depth resource that completely educated me and opened my eyes to the world of successful SEO optimization.  It is like an easy to understand text book that could easily be used to teach college level courses.  Even though this book is very thorough and full of important technical information, it is written in a very easy to digest and understand writing style.  The author is obviously a master at taking complicated subject matter and breaking it down to where the average person can easily understand it.  I had previously bought a couple other books on SEO, but they were so complicated to read and written from a very technical standpoint.  This book is completely the opposite.  When you are done reading it you will actually understand all aspects of SEO, including specifics for all of the Google products that SEO must work with flawlessly if you want your website to ever be seen by the masses.  All-in-all this book is very useful and excellent!  I would recommend it to anyone!

What an eye-opening and educational book.  I am so glad that I found this gem.  I have been a life-long allergy sufferer and really thought I was out of options.  I have taken medications and other remedies, but thus far, to no avail.  So when I saw this gem of a book on Amazon I figured it was worth a try.  Not only was it worth a try but for me it has been life changing!  Guy Chapman is a genius and a life saver!  This book is just what the doctor ordered.  Shortly after I read it I started implementing the things that Chapman discusses in his book, and almost miraculously, my allergies have subsided.  I feel like my life has been changed forever!  I can never repay the author for having been freed from my allergy nightmare!  If you or someone you know suffers from any type of allergy related ailment, then I highly recommend that you let them know about this book!  It is truly a life changer!

What a great erotic story that had my senses tingling from the very first page.  Lynette Casey obviously has a very naughty and creative imagination to be able to write such a sizzling story!  I instantly was attracted to the premise of this book as I am a big fan of erotic fiction, especially ones that have a different twist.  So after I started reading I was definitely glad that I bought the book.  I loved the storyline and the dynamics & chemistry between the two main characters Dawn and Katy.  The storyline flows nice with the perfect balance of twists and turns and steamy sexcapades.  The sexual encounters are top notch and really get your juices flowing.  Now I really dont like to give away the plots from stories that I read as it would be criminal to ruin a good book like this for another reader.  But I will say that it is an extremely hot read that will have you blushing and wanting more.  Great book!  5 big stars!

What an eye-opening and enlightening book.  I honestly couldn't believe what I was reading.  I take my car to a cheap car wash regularly, that is, until I read this book.  Thomas Ingram truly is a godsend for writing this book.  I must admit I was completely clueless to how horrible these car washes are for your car.  Since I've read the book, I have gone back to the car wash and I completely noticed some of the things that the author describes in the book.  The ten steps he provides on preventing damage to your car are priceless pieces of information that everyone should know about.  All-in-all, this was an incredible read that is filled with valuable information.  In my opinion this book is worth 10 times more than what the cover price is.  Do your self a favor and get this book!  And stop taking your car to the car wash!  I give this one 5 huge stars!

This is one great hot and steamy book that will leave your erotic senses tingling!  All I can say is Wow!  Wow! And Wow!  Once you start reading, you will not be able to put it down I promise you!  I love fetish, BDSM, role playing, etc., and am a huge snob when it comes to erotically-themed stories, but this book absolutely got my attention.  I really got excited reading it as the author is extremely good at being descriptive with just enough suggestive imagery to stimulate your senses and imagination.  Sakinaa Davies is an extremely creative author and obviously has a tremendously boundless imagination to pen such a fantastic story.  And, even though the book is highly erotic and descriptive, the actual storyline is really good!  I am not going to reveal the plot of the story here as I wouldnt want to ruin this good book for another reader.  But, if you are looking for a story that awakens & arouses your senses then this one is definitely it!  You should definitely put it on your summer reading list!  I give it 5 sexy & naughty stars!!!!

What a fun and imaginative light-hearted read.  If only it were true.  I was a huge fan of Michael Jackson, so when I saw that the Holy Ghost writer had teamed up with Sadia Barrameda, I absolutely had to check this book out.  I loved the whole premise of the story.  The different paths that are explored about what might have become of Michael's spirit or ghost was really intriguing and fascinating.  I was definitely mesmerized and fully enthralled from the very first page.  Both writers have gifts & tremendous imaginations that really shine brilliantly throughout this book and its journey.  I am not going to divulge what happens here as this book is way too good to ruin for someone else who hasn't read it yet.  But, if you like Michael Jackson as much as I did, and you were equally as saddened by his tragic passing, then I think you will really enjoy this book!

Outstanding is the best word that I can think of to describe this book!  The author really hit this one out of the park!  This is the 1st book I have read by Emily Walters and I must say I was pleasantly surprised.  It is a bit romance, a bit power struggle, a bit adventurous, and definitely well written.  I instantly fell in love with Sara Armstrong and so could relate to her story and emotional struggles.  The story definitely illustrates the epic struggle between power & love, and all of the dynamics that are involved!  The characters are very colorful & believable, and the momentum of the storyline is great!  There are so many different twists and turns that you wont want to put the book down.  I dont like to give away story lines as I would hate to ruin a good story for another reader, but trust me, you will absolutely love this story and the writing style of the author.  The author obviously has very colorful and creative imagination to be able to write such a story.  I absolutely loved it and cant say enough good things about it.  I highly recommend you put this book on your summer reading list!  What a great read!

This was an absolutely amazing book. It was incredibly fascinating and really dove deep into the Dream world and explored all of its different realms.  I have read a few other books on dreams and their interpretations, but this one is the most thorough and well done book that I have read to date on this topic. It is far from being just a simple dream exploration book.  It really analyzes so many different things that it is more like a definitive dream encyclopedia. The author is obviously highly gifted and an extreme expert on the subject. You will definitely be mesmerized once you start reading. You simply won't be able to put the book down. If you have been looking for a good book that really gives some great definitive information on exploring your dreams, then look no further. This is the book that you need to own.  It is the perfect rainy night or bedtime companion.

What a hot and steamy sizzler that had me blushing, and my senses tingling moments after I started reading. This is definitely a naughty read that illustrates just how much passion and lust can hide inside of a shy and nerdy girl.  The sex scenes are raw and uninhibited.  The author does a great job of bringing these sultry escapades to life. I found my heart racing at certain points in the story... Of which I am NOT going to disclose here in this review.. .  as I wouldn't want to ruin this great story for another reader.  Although there is all kinds of great sexual encounters in this book, the storyline really flows nicely and is well done. It is not cheesy like many other erotic stories that I have read. So in conclusion, I would highly recommend this book to anyone who likes erotic fiction. It will definitely get you all hot and bothered as you read it. I give it five big steamy stars!

This book really captivated my attention from the very first page. The characters are very colorful & believable, and the energy is great! The story follows the adventures of a young man, Henry Gallant, on his first assignment aboard the Repulse. Henry Gallant is a "Natural", with no genetic modification, the only human being left in the United Planets fleet. Space battles, aliens, and Henry's struggle to succeed kept me glued to my Kindle from page one to the end. The story is well developed, imaginative and flows beautifully. I found it to be extremely enjoyable!  There was plenty of mystery and tension and a bit of romance. A really great plot, with detailed descriptions throughout the story that allows you to see it playing out in your mind. I have read a lot of science fiction and I think that this book is one of the most unique in concept!

Outstanding is the best word that I can think of to describe this book!  It is pure magic from the very first page.  I am a huge fan of fantasy fiction and am quite a critic.  But I must say I was pleasantly surprised at how good this book is.  Mark A. Cooper has definitely hit a home run with this story.  There are so many brilliantly crafted scenes throughout this story that it really pulls you in completely.  I honestly didnt want to put the book down.  Cooper has masterfully engineered so many different elements of surprise into the storyline that you really dont know what is going to happen next.  The battle sequences are epic and reminded me of the same sort of metaphors & imagery that is found in the great classics Moby Dick and Old Man and The Sea.  Quite a great feat for a young writer to pull off.  His use of descriptive words & imagery really sets the scenes to where you can actually picture the landscape, the characters mannerisms, the monsters ferocity, and the backdrop to each transition of the story!  If you are like me and you love this type of fiction, then I highly recommend you get this book and put it at the top of your summer reading list.  You will absolutely love it and will instantly become a fan of this author!

Great shoes! I've been a fan of the Air Max line for many years and this version does not disappoint. The shoe fits great and looks great as well. I find that Nike and Adidas seem to make a more narrow fitting shoe that fits me better than other brands and that remains the case here.

This is a great book for anybody who wants to learn how to paint. It teaches things step by step just as if you were in a painting class and features exercises so you can follow along with your own paints with what is being shown in the book. If you've always wanted to learn how to paint but don't have the time or money to go to painting classes then this is a great book to start with. You can sit down whenever you have some free time and read through a lesson while you paint along. Recommended for anybody who is brand new to painting or even people who have painted in the past but now want to have a refresher on some of the basics.

I bought this for my mother who is in her 70's. She has bad knees and is debating surgery, but in the meantime was having a hard time just doing normal daily activities. I knew she would like something like a cane, but she didn't want one of those huge metal canes with the multiple feet and she thought that a regular cane was too easy to slip away and cause a fall. The HurryCane addresses both of these concerns by being sleek and unobtrusive, yet offer a nice large handle grip and the multiple feet at the bottom to help support weight at various angles.As a bonus the HurryCane quickly collapses in size so it can easily be used to go into someplace such as a restaurant or show and then collapsed once you have sat down. This is also helpful if you go to the grocery and want to use one of the electric carts as you can collapse the cane down and place it in the cart's basket while you are shopping.All in all she is very happy with the HurryCane and uses it daily. If you are looking for a cane make sure to check this one out as it combines several great features into one affordable product!

I won't go into details about everything the Fire TV Stick offers as far as content as you've probably seen that elsewhere. For me the main thing was to compare the Fire TV Stick against the regular Fire TV.The quick version is: Go ahead and pay more to get the "regular" Fire TV instead of the Stick.Here's why:- The Fire TV Stick still requires a separate power supply to be plugged in. So even though the device is small and plugs right into the HDMI port on your TV you still have to run a power cable to it and plug it into AC power. To me that reduces the benefit down to just not having to run the actual HDMI cable from the regular Fire TV to your TV which isn't that big of a deal.- The Fire TV Stick remote does not offer the speech recognition features like the regular Fire TV does. To me this is one of the primary features that separates the Fire TV from the competition. Being able to just say what you are looking for instead of using the onscreen keyboard saves a ton of time and frustration.- The Fire TV Stick is noticeably slower when navigating through the UI and accessing applications such as the basic games and things that are available with it.So in the end the Stick is a much cheaper buy, which may be the most important factor to you, but for me it is worth it to spend a little extra and get the full Fire TV. The speed of the interface and convenience of the speech recognition remote alone make it worth it.

As far as I know this is the best version of Scrabble you can buy. Mainly because of three things:1. The board simply folds up and becomes the carrying case. No extra box to deal with and it has a built-in handle and stays closed via magnets.2. When you unfold the board it has built in wheels that are set at the precise angles so the board can be easily rotated to the next player as play progresses.3. The board itself has raised grid lines so your letters stay in place even when the board is spun around.If you like playing Scrabble do yourself a favor and get this edition. It's the best  you can buy!

FYI - This review is for:Bonsaii PrinterBro C162-B Desktop-Style Cross-Cut 7-Sheet Paper/Clip/Staple Shredder, 18.9*17.3*25.4", 3-in-1 Combo Unit, 9.3 Gallon Draw-out WastebasketI've noticed that Amazon seems to list reviews of different Bonsaii units together under multiple units so make sure you are looking at the proper item when you read my review.I previously had several smaller paper shredders. You know, the usual kind that sit next to your desk and have a slot on the top to feed paper in. These worked fine but I found that they were always filling up too quickly and the process to empty them was less than ideal (having to lift the bulky and somewhat heavy shredding unit off of the can in order to dump the can out). They also took up valuable floor space since the paper fed in from the top.That's where this Bonsaii model comes in! Not only does it solve your paper shredding needs, but it doubles as a great printer stand with built-in hidden storage! The unit is quite strong and seems like it can easily support almost any printer. I have a small HP LaserJet sitting on top of it and it fits perfectly. The paper feeds in through an angled slot on the front. Below the slot there is a large door that opens to reveal the very large bag holding area where the shredded paper goes, and below that a small storage area separated by a shelf. I use the storage area to keep extra paper and toner cartridges.When you open the door there is a pull out metal rack that you use to attach the trash bag to the unit. You simply feed a bag through the rack and wrap the upper edges around the rack to hold it in place. Then you slide the rack with bag attached back into the unit. The unit comes with several large Bonsaii specific bags but you can probably just use any trash bag. I've actually been dumping the bags out into a regular trash bag and then reusing the Bonsaii bag, but if you want to skip that step you can just throw the trash bag away straight out of the shredder.The door has a safety interlock so the shredder cannot be operated while the door is open.The shredder is very quiet compared to other ones that I've used. With other shredders sometimes I would be needing to shred things late at night but would hold off until the next day because I didn't want to wake other people up. With this shredder I use it in the middle of the night without fear of it making too much noise.I've only found a few downsides so far. First, it can only shred up to 6 sheets at a time. I would probably only do 5 sheets maximum just to avoid any potential jams. It does sound like the shredder is having to work hard to shred multiple sheets, but I think this is because it doesn't have a large amount of power in order to keep the motor operation as quiet as it is. Kind of along the same lines, it can't shred credit cards or CDs. This isn't a huge deal to me but it was nice having the ability to shred old cards or computer CDs every once in awhile.Overall this is the best shredder I've ever owned. It's quiet, can hold quite a bit of shreds before needing to be emptied, makes a great printer stand, and hides away both the shreds and any supplies you want to store in it. In fact, most people will probably just think it's a printer stand until you reveal it's a hidden shredder!

These full adhesive notes are exactly what I was looking for! I have a habit of writing to-do items and ongoing project notes on Post-its and then sticking them all around my keyboard on my desk so I can easily reference them. The regular Post-its have a tendency to start peeling off after a few days, most likely because papers, my arm, etc. are brushing up against them and peeling them back. These full adhesive notes aren't going anywhere! They stick completely flush to my desk and I don't have any issues with them peeling off. The bottom edge of the note has a space with no adhesive so they are still easy to peel off when you want to remove them.

Great software! Like many of you I had been using TurboTax for years but their recent changes prompted me to give H&R Block (formerly TaxCut) another look. The software was just as easy to use for my situation as TurboTax was. I had regular income, investment income, mortgage deductions, and rental property and the Premium edition handled it all fine.As an added bonus H&R Block offers a 10% refund bonus that can be applied to a large amount of store gift cards if you so choose. TurboTax offers something similar but last time I used it you could only get an Amazon gift card. So if you are into the bonus thing H&R Block has a lot more options such as restaurants, retail stores, etc.

I purchased two of these devices to use in monitoring the temperature and humidity levels on different floors of my home. When I received them I placed them right next to each other and both continued registering the same values throughout the course of the day. These values also matched a larger thermometer that I had so I conclude that at least the temperature portion is accurate. The humidity portion also seems accurate, at least to the point that both units register the same value.These have built in magnetic backs so they are easy to attach to a file cabinet, refrigerator, etc. for easy monitoring. They also include an adhesive backed slim piece of metal so you can stick the metal on any surface and then the device will mount using the magnet as usual.All in all this is exactly what I was looking for. It's compact and does what I need it to.

Well, these are Post-it Notes. Hopefully you already know how they work.I got these as I like to keep ongoing and daily tasks organized one per note at work. I wanted different colors to differentiate between to-do list type tasks and longer term projects.The adhesive on these is pretty good. It could be a tad bit stronger as they routinely slip around on my desk or other surfaces I have them stuck to, but they do stay put for the most part. There is a stronger version available and also a kind where the entire back of the paper is coated in adhesive, but I don't want to spend the extra money on those other kinds when these work good for my purposes.My package came with the following color mixture (which I assume is how they all come):2 packs of yellow2 packs of orange/red2 packs of purple4 packs of blue4 packs of green/blueI would have preferred that it came with 4 packs of yellow instead of 4 packs of the green/blue as the green/blue color is similar to the blue color. So basically you get 8 pads that are a similar color and then only 2 each of the other 3 colors.All in all these are a great buy and give you some better organizational options rather than just having all yellow notes stuck everywhere.

These speakers will surprise you! Not only are they fairly small compared to big floor standing speakers, but they are SO inexpensive. You can't even get a single speaker from most other companies for the price that you pay here for a set of two! They have great range. Not a ton of bass, but that is expected, although they will surprise you with the amount of bass they do deliver. Highs and mid-tones sound great. I connected these to my turntable and small amp and they work great as a little separate music listening station with the turntable in between the two speakers. It really is hard to beat these speakers for the price. You'd probably have to spend hundreds more to get a noticeable gain in sound quality.
I can't recommend this. It warped after just a few uses. Since it no longer laid flat it would try to spin around while cutting. Very dangerous. I threw it away.

I originally bought this printer just so I had a way to occasionally print color accented documents (flyers, signs, etc.). My primary printer is an HP laser printer but that just prints in black. This Canon printer is AMAZING for the price!It uses four small ink cartridges (cyan, magenta, yellow, and black) and one large black ink cartridge (the larger black cartridge is used when you are just printing regular documents that don't need color). The cartridges that come with the printer say "SETUP" on them so I suspect they are not quite as full of ink as the replacements you buy. As is always the case with inkjet printers the ink is fairly expensive and doesn't last nearly as long as a toner cartridge in a laser printer would, but I find them to be acceptable. I was able to print 30 or so full page color flyers/photos at the highest setting before one of the initial cartridges needed to be replaced.As I'm sure you've already read the printer can do both black and white and color copies. I've used this quite a bit as it's a very handy feature if you just need a copy every now and then (don't use it for high volume or you'll go bankrupt on ink!). The copy speed is fast even for color copies.I have the printer sitting across the room from my computer desk on it's own little table. The nice thing about it being wireless is that you literally just plug in the power cord and you're done. It will work from anywhere in your house without additional cables from your router or computer.The only other cable you may need to connect is a telephone line if you plan on using the fax features. Since I rarely use the fax portion I just plug in a long telephone cable whenever I need to send a fax and then unplug the telephone cable when I'm done.The printer has two trays on the front. The lower tray holds regular sized paper and can just be left full with plain paper. If you want to print a large sheet of photo paper you can just sit it on top of the plain paper so it gets fed into the printer next. For smaller pieces of paper such as 4x6" photo paper you can use the top tray. There is also a CD tray that allows you to print labels directly on CDs or DVDs that have a printable surface.Another neat thing with this printer is that the front paper output tray can be left closed when not in use. This way dust isn't settling on the tray or getting inside the printer. As soon as you go to print something the tray will automatically flip down so there is a place for the paper to go after it has been printed.THE BEST FEATURE:I've saved the best for last. THE SCANNER! This printer is worth the price even if you never print anything from it! I would buy it for the scanner alone!Since it's wireless you don't need to attach it to your computer. Just lift the lid, place whatever you want to scan inside, and then connect to the scanner from your computer. This is a very nice convenience as I was used to having to plug a USB scanner into my laptop every time I wanted to scan something. Now I don't have to mess with any wires or move the scanner or laptop to be near each other.When you place multiple photos or other documents on the scanner at the same time the scanner will automatically recognize the borders of each document and scan them to separate files. This is a very nice time-saving feature when you are scanning large amounts of old photos. Just place as many photos as you can fit at a time on the scanner and they will all become separate image files with one pass of the scanner!The feature that has spoiled me the most is the sheet feeder. In the past I would have to individually scan pages of a document if I wanted to create a PDF. Many times I would be scanning 10-20 page contracts and would have to insert each page, wait for the scanner to scan, click a button on the screen, then insert the next page, and so on until the entire document was scanned. With this Canon scanner you simply place the ENTIRE document in the sheet feeder on top and with one click it scans all the pages and creates a PDF file (and very quickly at that!). This has saved me so much time and frustration!This printer is a STEAL for the price! I look at it as a great scanner that just happens to come with a free printer and fax machine!

I really like this table. It has a sleek modern look without the high price usually associated with modern furnishings. The tabletop is made out of wood with a glossy white paint finish applied. When I first received the table the top had a corner chipped off of it, which I suspect was due to the very tight packaging that the table comes in. I contacted the manufacturer and they promptly sent me a new tabletop that was very well packed. Also, be aware that some of the chrome frame pieces may have very slight imperfections on them (scratches, weld marks, etc.), but I don't think anybody will really notice these unless you inspect the table closely. For me it is a great buy and fits in nicely with my other "modern" furniture.

I wanted a space heater that included a fan so the heat would actually get spread around the room rather than just radiate straight up from the unit (like most heaters). This item seemed to fit the bill and produced a nice amount of heat along with a fairly powerful fan, however on the particular one I received the fan had some type of clicking/rubbing noise while operating. I was expecting the usually whooshing sound of a fan (which would have been fine), but this other sound was more like a piece of plastic or something was hitting the fan as it spun and was very distracting. Hopefully mine was just a bad apple. I returned it and tried another brand instead.

This is a nice hard case for storing your negatives. The case has an edge on the lid so it helps keep dust out and also has two snapping clasps to keep it closed. The case is by no means airtight but it should do a pretty decent job of keeping dust out. I wish it used a D-ring style inside. It just has standard O-rings so your pages are never lying completely flat. It seems like this item should be a lot cheaper than it is. It seems like something that would sell for only a few dollars if it was geared towards "back to school" rather than photography.

This is a perfect case for me. It completely protects the sides and back of the phone without adding much bulk to the phone. The back is a clear hard plastic so you can still see what the actual phone looks like behind it. The sides are rubberized to make pushing the side buttons easy but the rubber is not too sticky so it will still easily slide into and out of your pocket. The sides of the case are just slightly taller than the screen of the phone so you can place the phone screen down on a table without the screen actually touching the table. The back of the case has a similar design with the clear plastic being thicker than the new iPhone 6 camera since the camera now protrudes from the rear of the phone a bit. This along with some small raised edges on the back prevent the camera lens from coming into contact with anything when you lay the phone down.

I got these cups to use with my Keurig single cup brewer. Before they arrived I was concerned that they would not fit under my brewer as I have the smallest one that does not have a water reservoir (you just pour in the water that you want to use for each drink). Once the cups arrived I was pleasantly surprised that they just barely fit under the Keurig machine if I remove the drip tray. A perfect fit! Now I can brew directly into the paper cups, snap a lid on, and take my drink with me!

This is one of those products that is designed so well it's almost like a work of art. When not in use it folds completely flat. To use it you just flip open each end. The bottom piece has a standard size tripod mounting socket and the top piece is spring loaded. It has rubber grips on each end to securely hold your phone in place, and the tension from the spring loaded top piece makes sure the phone wouldn't go anywhere once you have it in the grip.As a bonus there seems to be enough space within the grip so you can slightly tilt the phone up or down once you have it in the grip. For instance you can place the bottom of the phone towards the front of the grip, and the top of the phone towards the back of the grip and your camera will then be aimed up a little bit. This is nice if you want to just use this device on its own without a tripod. You can just sit it on a table or something and still aim it up and down a bit to get a good shot. Pretty useful since it can fold flat and be thrown in your pocket if you don't want to take a whole tripod with you.

Overall I really like the Fire TV. The interface is fast and Amazon content begins playing extremely fast. I won't repeat what all the other reviews say regarding the hardware itself.However, I am disappointed at the moment as the Showtime Anytime app does not allow DirecTV customers to use it. I also own an AppleTV and bought the Amazon Fire TV primarily to use it with Showtime Anytime since Showtime Anytime is not available on the AppleTV. I use the AppleTV for HBO GO (which is not on the Fire TV at the moment), so I figured I would just switch between the two devices in order to get Showtime Anytime and HBO GO.I am hopeful that Showtime Anytime will be available on the Fire TV for DirecTV customers soon, and also hope that Amazon is able to add HBO GO in the future so I can just use the Fire TV for everything.The Fire TV has potential, but if you are a DirecTV customer and want to use Showtime Anytime be aware that this is not possible right now.

You just can't find a better turntable at this price. Not only does this model sound incredible but it also looks fantastic even when it's not in use!When you receive the turntable it will be packaged very well from the factory. Make sure you save the box so you can safely relocate it later if you move! Inside the box you'll find the plastic dust cover and below that the main turntable plinth/tonearm assembly and in the very bottom of the box the metal platter and felt mat packaged separately. There's also a bag with the instructions and the various accessories and cables.Installation is very easy even though this is an entry-level audiophile device. First you loop the included drive belt around the motor pulley and platter hub. Then you simply sit the metal platter on top.Next you place the downforce weight at the rear of the tonearm and adjust it until the tonearm will "float" and remain balanced without pitching forward or backwards. Once you get it to do this you rotate the inner portion of the weight until the "0" mark lines up with the indicator line. Now when you twist the back portion of the weight it will move the numbers as well so you can properly set the downforce. The manual shows the proper downforce for the included cartridge or you set it to whatever your cartridge says if you are using something different.Once you have the downforce set you loop the skating weight line over one of three points on the tonearm (the manual also explains which point to use based on the downforce), then you feed the weight itself through the metal loop that allows it to hang freely.That's basically it for the initial setup. The cartridge itself is already installed from the factory so you don't need to mess with any of its settings unless you have replaced it with something different.The dustcover simply slides over the two pegs at the rear of the turntable and can then be pivoted open and closed.The audio outputs, power connection, and power switch are all mounted underneath the main deck and are set back just enough so they remain pretty well hidden from view. The rocker-style power switch is under the front left side and is very easy to switch on and off.The turntable comes with a decent set of RCA cables that also has a grounding wire incorporated into the cables which makes things less cluttered.Note that since the drive motor is located beneath the platter you will need to remove the platter each time you want to switch between 33 and 45 RPM. To do this you remove the platter and then move the drive belt to one of two positions on the pulley. Alternatively Pro-Ject sells a speed box that allows you to adjust the speed with the push of a button. I suspect I will buy this rather soon as even though moving the belt isn't that difficult I really don't like putting extra wear and tear on the belt all the time, plus the speed box supposedly smoothes out the power signal and provides a noticeable increase in sound quality (but don't worry, the sound quality is great to begin with).Also note that this turntable, like pretty much any good one you look at, will require a pre-amp if your amp does not have one built in. If you are new to turntables this may be something you weren't aware of. You will connect the RCA audio outputs from the turntable to the pre-amp, and then from the pre-amp run another set of RCA cables to your actual amp or receiver.A special note: When you receive your turntable make sure you give it a good physical inspection. The first one I received had one of the corners chipped off and upon further inspection had horizontal cracking in the wood around each of the two dust cover mounts on the back. It looked like the dust cover mounts themselves had been tightened too much. I contacted the seller and they were very pleasant to deal with and offered to immediately send me a replacement, however when they inspected the rest of their stock they discovered that all of the ones they had also had the horizontal cracks around the dust cover mounts. Apparently there was a bad batch of these from the factory. I ended up ordering from a different retailer and luckily received one without the cracks.

FYI, when I purchased the vinyl version of this album on Amazon I received the UK edition (catalog number YT080LP) that also includes the entire album on a CD as well. Since it also included the standard Amazon Autorip MP3 edition I ended up with the vinyl, CD, and MP3 copies of the album. Even though I will probably never use the CD it was a nice bonus to receive the UK edition.

I was looking for a compact case to store some digital photo backups. My main criteria was I wanted a case that could store more than the usual six or ten discs but I also wanted something that could fit into a safe deposit box or small safe.This case is perfect for my use. It has twelve double-sided pages so you can insert two discs in each page. The outer shell is a soft yet rigid design that holds it's shape and provides protection for the contents. It also has a nice zipper closure so nothing can fall out or easily get in from the outside while it is closed.

I got this phone to use in my home office. The main things I was looking for were great speakerphone performance and a mute button as I spend lots of time on conference calls and needed a way to simply leave them on speakerphone and mute for when I'm not actively talking.For the speakerphone portion I knew I wanted a phone that required separate AC power as the phones that try to power the speaker phone simply off the phone line power aren't very good. This phone does use the separate AC power adapter and the speakerphone works great. The speaker is nice and loud and I never have complaints from people on the other end when I am talking on speakerphone.The mute button is right along the bottom of the phone making it easy to access. My only complaint with the mute button is that it doesn't have any indication to show that it is enabled. The speakerphone button has a nice red LED light next to it to show that the speakerphone is on. It would have been nice if the mute button had a similar light to let you know when you have mute on. As it is the only indication that the phone is muted is via a "MUTE" notice on the main LCD display at the top of the phone. Unfortunately the display at the top of the phone can't be angled up at all so it lays almost flat with the phone, and at the same time it is not backlit at all. This means that the display is VERY hard to read when you are sitting at your desk. You have to lean forward until your head is almost directly above the phone in order to read the display, and thus tell if you have mute on or off.The phone allows two lines to be used and also has a conference call button to connect both lines together. It also has a headset input so you can easily attach a headset if you'd prefer to use that instead of the speakerphone or handset.The white strip down the side of the phone looks similar to a speed dial list on other phones, but that's not what it is for on this phone. This phone can actually be used as part of a multiple phone setup for your small office or even in your house if you want. You will need to install this same model of phone in all areas but once you do you can assign each phone an extension number and then call between the phones directly or page through the remote phones. This makes a nice little intercom system without requiring an actual central phone system. I don't use this feature since I just have a single phone but it seems like a nice addition.Overall I am pleased with the phone. The lack of a light on the mute button is a slight annoyance but honestly I couldn't find any other phones with the features I wanted so I can live with it.If you're looking for a desk phone with a good speakerphone then you should really consider this model.

I bought this keyboard to use with my laptop when I'm working at my desk connected to a larger monitor. It has a very modern design and uses the somewhat trendy chiclet key design. If you've ever used a Mac aluminum slim keyboard then this will feel similar to you. It is very slim and has no angle adjustments at all. It sits how it sits.Some nice additions on this keyboard include the separate volume and mute keys and a dedicated key to bring up the Windows calculator.This is honestly exactly what I was looking for despite it being one of the absolute least expensive keyboards out there. If you need a basic keyboard to use at your desk then this is the one.

This is a fantastic monitor. I liked it so much I ended up buying two!My main concern when buying a monitor is the issue of "dead" or "hot" pixels. Either a pixel that is always off resulting in a noticeable black dot or a pixel that is always on resulting in a dot of color that never changes. Many people don't consider this an issue but for me once I notice one of these pixels on my monitor it bothers me from that point on.The first thing I do when I get a new monitor, laptop, tablet, cell phone, etc. is run through several different images of just solid colors and carefully examine the whole screen to make sure there are no dead pixels. When I did this with both of the monitors I bought I found zero problems. This is great as I really hate having to ship monitors back and forth.This monitor is nice and bright, provides great viewing angles, and offers a nice matte screen (unlike many computers these days that come with glossy highly reflective screens).Bottom line: This is a terrific monitor that won't disappoint you!

I bought this cable to connect my Lenovo ThinkPad to my desktop monitor. The Lenovo has the small Mini DisplayPort port and the monitor has the standard size DisplayPort port. This cable worked great with zero setup required. I connected it between my laptop and monitor and the monitor started working immediately. Great all around and a great price.

I've always liked remote controlled models. I had several radio controlled cars when I was younger and always dreamed of building an airplane or helicopter that could really fly.Unfortunately the larger flying models ended up being difficult to fly and maintain. Not because I couldn't  build them, but more because they require a lot of space to operate and also can break VERY easily if you aren't well practiced in how to fly them. Put simply I wanted a toy I could mess around with but not something I had to spend hours and hours working on as a full-time hobby.The Syma S107 helicopter is simply amazing. You can seriously take this thing out of the box, charge it up, and begin flying it without any practice or any worries. It flies amazingly stable! As long as you don't "floor it" and push the stick all the way to the top immediately you'll be fine (otherwise you'll fly straight into the ceiling). The helicopter can easily simply hover in one spot. This ability to me is just amazing when you consider how much design and technology has to go into accomplishing something like this.The body is actually very durable with a mostly metal frame. The blades themselves utilize a folding design that means you can fly this into the wall, ceiling, floor, etc. without much worry about damaging it. I've run it into the wall and other objects many times and even though the blades start striking the wall and the helicopter falls to the ground I have yet to damage it. Many times it will fall down and land upright so I can just crank it up from the remote again and start flying without even having to touch it!The helicopter uses an infrared remote control rather than radio, but surprisingly this works great inside. I can only guess that the remote puts out a very bright and wide angle infrared signal because it will even work if the helicopter is around corners or if the remove is behind an object.While flying you have three controls:- The left stick moves only up and down and does not automatically reset itself. This is used to control the speed of the helicopter blades, which in turn determine the altitude that your helicopter will fly at. Since you can take your finger off the left stick and it will remain in place you are able to get the helicopter to a hovering altitude and leave it there "hands-free".- The right stick moves both up and down and left and right. Moving it left and right changes the speed at which the counter-rotating main blades spin, thus causing the helicopter to turn left or right. Moving the stick up and down causes the helicopter to pitch forward or backwards (by using a smaller propeller at the tail of the helicopter). When the helicopter is pitched forward it causes the main blades to then propel the whole helicopter forward. The reverse is true when you have it pitched backwards.The remote control unit takes four AA batteries. The helicopter itself has a built in lithium battery that can be recharged either through the included USB cable or via a small cable that pulls out of the bottom of the remote control. I recommend charging the helicopter using the USB cable when possible so you can prolong the life of the batteries you have in your remote control. I actually just connect the USB cable to a standard iPhone charger and charge the helicopter that way.A nice feature of the USB cable is that it has a light that lights up when the helicopter is fully charged so you know it's ready to go. Charging time is somewhere around an hour and provides you with about seven to nine minutes of flight. When the battery starts running low the helicopter simply won't fly as high. Even when you have the blade speed maxxed out you'll notice that the helicopter will slowly start drifting downward until eventually it won't have enough power to even lift off the floor.I'm in my thirties and have this little guy sitting on my desk in my home office. It's a great little toy to fly around for a few minutes as a break! If you've always wanted a little helicopter but don't have the time or the drive to mess around with the big models then get this! It provides great straight out of the box fun and the price is right!

This thing is very impressive especially given its price. The technology that goes into these is simply amazing the way it is able to individually control each of the four propellers and automatically keep the model level.A word of caution though: This little guy is very fast and takes lots of practice to fly accurately. If you are used to the other standard Syma helicopters this is a totally different ball game. The other helicopters are very easy to fly and can be used even in small rooms because of their stability. This one requires a very large room or even outside on a calm day because it is so fast and it is also easy to lose control of if you aren't well practiced with the multiple controls.The model has an automatic feature which will let you do a flip with it. This is very cool since this move is a complex combination of propeller actions but with this model you just push a single button and you do a perfect flip. The only downside is that you will lose quite a bit of altitude when doing this so you really need to be outside or in a large gym or something.A very important tip that I learned: The model will automatically calibrate itself to "level" as soon as you turn the power switch on the model to the ON position. This means that if you are holding the model or lifting it up slightly in order to access the switch then as soon as you move the switch it will assume that whatever way you are holding it is level. If this happens then you will notice that the model constantly pulls one way or another because it thinks it is flying level. Therefore you have to make sure that you have the model totally level and flat on the ground when you turn the power switch to ON. Otherwise you'll be trying to adjust the trim settings to no avail in order to correct the lean of the model while in flight.

This scoop is great. It's simple and durable. It is pure stainless steel without any type of metallic coating like other scoops have. This means that the coating will never start flaking off and getting into your ice cream. It also means that you can toss this in the dishwasher or simply rinse it off without any worries.One thing that I've noticed with this scoop compared to others is that it really can dig into the hardest frozen of ice cream. With other scoops I was having to pop the ice cream in the microwave for a few seconds to make it at least slightly soft. No need with this beast. Pull your ice cream out of the freezer and have at it. This easily digs into it and provides well rounded scoops with little effort!

I, like many of you reading this I suspect, grew up watching "Battle of the Planets" in the United States. It wasn't until many years later that I learned about Gatchaman and how Battle of the Planets was a modified version of the original.I still have a few VHS tapes from the very early 80's with the original airings of Battle of the Planets on them, but other than that I largely had forgotten about the show for the past thirty years. There were some previous releases of Gatchaman on DVD but for whatever reason I never really looked into them.A friend and I were recently having a discussion about Gatchaman as he is a fan too, which prompted me to look it up on Amazon. Much to my delight I saw that this new Blu-ray release had just become available. I ordered it immediately.Now that I've received it I've watched a few episodes and am having flashbacks to my childhood. One day I will get the time to watch the whole series but for now just a few episodes are great. Having the option to choose between multiple languages and subtitles also provides several ways to experience these original episodes.If you were a fan of Battle of the Planets then this is the set for you. You won't get 7-Zark-7 or 1-Rover-1 (those were added to the American version to make up for the scenes that were cut out), but you will get the original Japanese version of the shows with all their uncensored violence and original dialogue.

This case is ridiculously overpriced for what it is, but honestly it is the best case you can get so if you can afford it I would recommend getting it and not wasting your time with the cheaper cases. It fits the Kindle Paperwhite perfectly and is as slim as possible. This case truly transforms your Kindle Paperwhite into a slim book that just happens to be electronic. You can slip the Kindle into your bag or backpack without worrying about scratching the screen.I tried several other cases and none of them came close to the fit and finish of the genuine Amazon case. If you want the best case then go ahead and order this. Once you get over the sticker shock you won't be disappointed with the end product. Long after price is forgotten, quality lives on.

I can't say enough good things about this book!Richard Dawkins explains practically every scientific element that has been incorrectly explained by religions for thousands of years. He does it in a simple, matter-of-fact way that is easy to understand no matter your education level. Mr. Dawkins is well known for his often in-your-face attitude about religion, but in this particular book he tones it down a bit and treads lightly on the topic while at the same time dismissing all the old religious misconceptions about science.From evolution to plate tectonics to the reason the Earth has seasons... and everything in between! Dawkins explains each item completely and also dedicates some space at the beginning of each chapter to review the religious misconceptions and past (incorrect) explanations for why things happens. He then proceeds to go over the real reasons behind each item.I truly wish that this book was required reading for all children. Even more so I wish that most extremely religious adults would read this book as well. It really is written in a way that is tasteful and would hopefully convince people that the "magic" they see is simply the "reality" of science! I just hope that Dawkins name doesn't steer people away, but I know it will. If you want to open your mind and find out how things REALLY work then please by all means pick up this book!

These batteries work great and seem to be exactly the same as normal Duracells. I use these mainly in devices that don't require frequent battery replacement such as remote controls. I also use them in devices that don't get used often such as flashlights and emergency radios.Rechargables are nice, but they don't hold their charge for long periods of time between uses so they aren't well suited for emergency items. They also really aren't cost effective to use in things like remotes where you don't need to replace them very often since the rechargeable batteries cost more to begin with. In both of this situations regular alkaline batteries are your best bet and this package of them lets you get a bunch at a great price.

Okay, I'll admit it... I'm a thirtysomething male with no kids and I still bought this book. As an animal lover, and particularly a cat person, I couldn't resist the amazing drawings of Mr. Wuffles. Having owned a few black cats myself I was amazed at how realistic the drawings of the cat are!The story is pretty amusing and features a small group of tiny aliens that land in a ship that Mr. Wuffles thinks is a cat toy. After narrowly escaping Mr. Wuffles they are able to enlist the aid of some bugs to distract the cat while they escape. The story is very basic and features the aliens speaking in their own language so it is easy to follow for kids of all ages.If you like cats or just enjoy well illustrated books then this is one to add to your collection for sure!

I purchased this to use with my MacBook Air. It works great since it doesn't require a separate power supply. I can plug it into a USB port on my MacBook and it's ready to use!Not only does this allow my MacBook Air (which doesn't have any type of optical drive to begin with) to read CDs, DVDs, and Blu-ray Discs, but it also lets me write Blu-ray Discs which is the main reason that I purchased it. Using single layer discs you can get 25GB on a single disc. The double layer discs can store up to 50GB but they are more expensive than just buying two of the single layer discs. These are great for making an additional backup of photos just so you have a permanent copy that can't be overwritten or damaged by magnetic fields like hard drives can be.Slim, no external power supply, plug and play with Mac, and writes Blu-ray Discs.... exactly what I was looking for!

These are perfect batteries for small electronic games such as the older ones that were around before all the fancy Game Boys and things came out. Most of them take two of these batteries so this pack has five sets of batteries if you use them for that purpose.

I wanted a set of metal measuring cups that were formed from a single piece of metal (rather than having the handles bolted or welded on as in some other brands). These work great! I like them because they are all metal so they clean very easily in the dishwasher, and they are easily separated. I actually just keep them all separate rather than using the little chain that connects them. They also store easily in your drawer since you can nest them all together. If you look closely you will see that each cup has a small little nub that sticks out on the opposite side from the handle. This is what allows them to nest evenly without falling into each other at an angle. If you are looking for some solid yet simple measuring cups then these are the ones for you!

These were exactly what I was looking for. I had purchased a few Blu-ray Discs at Blockbuster when they were going out of business and they just came in the regular Blockbuster DVD cases with the paper insert. These didn't match all my other Blu-rays on the shelf so I wanted to get them into proper cases. These fit the bill! These are identical to several other cases that my movies came in and look great compared to generic DVD cases.

I wanted to like the new Kindle Paperwhite. I tend to read my Kindle books on my iPhone and was looking for a little bit larger screen and also a device that wouldn't be a total loss if it were to get damaged at the beach, by the pool, etc. (vs. my actual phone that contains much more than just the Kindle software).I first purchased the new Paperwhite at a local Best Buy store. Upon opening it and powering it on there were very noticeable "specks" underneath the top layer of the screen. These were not visible when the display light was off, but as soon as the light was on, even at its lowest setting, these spots would become visible. The best way I can describe it is that there is some type of dust or other imperfection that is between the top layer of the screen where the light is and the screen itself. When the light turns on it hits these specks from the side and causes bright white spots to appear on the display.Since these bright white spots were right in the middle of the display they were right in the middle of each page of the book. I returned the first Paperwhite to Best Buy and decided that I would just buy it directly from Amazon because I figured Amazon would be better able to support their own product in case I got another one with this flaw.I ordered the second Paperwhite from Amazon and when it arrived I was disappointed to find that it too had the same issue. This time the specks were a little lower on the screen than before.I contact Amazon support to have the item exchanged. Amazon requires that you actually call and speak to somebody before returning or exchanging a Kindle, presumably because they want to make sure you understand how to use it and aren't returning it for a simple problem that they can fix over the phone.When I called and explained the problem the support person I got kept insisting that bright spots along the side of the screen were normal. I already knew this as there was significant coverage in major tech website's reviews about the bright edge lighting on the Paperwhite. This was not my issue at all though as I was totally aware of and expected the slightly brighter light along the edges of the Paperwhite. The bright edge lighting does not bother me at all as it is on the edge and not in the middle of the screen where it will be in your line of sight while reading. After explaining the issue several times the agent seemed to reluctantly agree to send me a replacement Paperwhite.The replacement Paperwhite arrived a few days later and, not surprisingly at this point, had the same issue but this time there were even more specks and they were once again right in the middle of the screen. Once again I contacted Amazon by phone to inquire about a replacement. This time the agent was very defensive and indicated that "Amazon is fully aware of this issue but has chosen not to offer replacements for it" (the agent's words). I was told that my only options were to either keep the one I had or return it for a refund and "choose another Kindle device" but that they would not allow me to exchange it for another Paperwhite. If I had known this was going to be the case I wouldn't have returned the second device because at least with it there were less specks and they were lower on the screen.In any event I ended up just returning the third Paperwhite as well and have since started using other devices to read Kindle books. Generally I find Amazon's customer service to be top-notch and have been a frequent and long-time customer of theirs, so I was a bit surprised that they didn't want to fully support their flagship product. Having known issues with the display and not wanting to fix them seems unusual for Amazon.Some people may look at this as being picky, but when I am going to be reading thousands of pages of text on a display I want it to be absolutely perfect and not have a bright white dot in the middle of the page. It it was a regular book then it would be fine because it would only affect a single page, but on the Kindle that display is EVERY page of EVERY book you read.Since this flaw was present on three separate devices purchased from two different sources, and Amazon even told me on the phone that it is a known issue, then I must assume that it is an issue on a a large percentage of the devices but most people either don't notice it or don't care about it.If you decide to purchase the Paperwhite and are at all sensitive to "dead pixels" or bright spots on your computer monitor then make sure you give the Kindle screen a good inspection when you receive it to ensure there aren't any of these specks that reflect light trapped between your screen.

This is hands down the best set of cookware I've ever owned! Each piece simply screams quality from the moment you open the box.The design is very modern and functional. You will be amazed at the sheer weight of each item. The large pot is several pounds! The shine on the steel is great and holds up fine in the dishwasher.Since these are pure "professional grade" stainless steel items you don't have to worry about hand cleaning them to protect any type of non-stick coatings. These are stainless through and through and can easily be thrown in the dishwasher. Without the non-stick finish there is the possibility of food sticking more than you are used to, but personally I haven't had any issues and I like knowing that there aren't any strange chemicals from the finish wearing off on my food.If you are looking for a nice complete set of cookware then look no further. I looked at everything here on Amazon as well as what was available at several local stores and finally settled on this set. Once it arrived I knew I had made the right choice!

I purchased these nylon spoons as an alternative to the traditional wooden spoons. They work great and are super easy to clean in the dishwasher!I've used them for baking needs as well as for mixing things such as hot pasta and vegetables on the stove top. They are very sturdy and the nylon surface doesn't give food a place to stick to like it tends to do on the wooden spoons.Overall these are a great wooden spoon replacement for your kitchen. I will probably buy a few more in the future.

I purchased this little birdy at the same time I purchased the Alessi tea kettle just so I would have a spare in the future in case anything ever happens to my original bird. I compared this one and the one that came with the tea kettle and they are exactly the same. If you are needing a replacement for yours then this is what you need.

I've wanted this tea kettle ever since I first saw it many many years ago. The whimsical yet modern design adds a great finishing touch to any kitchen. This is a piece that you will want to leave on your cooktop all the time as a great accent piece.Not only is the design fun but it is also a great tea kettle! The circular handle provides easy pouring and is mounted high enough to not interfere with filling the water through the top. The classic red bird whistle works just as you would expect it to. Some people may find that having to manually pull out the bird before pouring the water is an extra step compared to other kettles where the whistle simply flips up, but this doesn't bother me at all.The whole kettle looks great with a fantastic silver shine! This is definitely an extremely expensive item as far as function goes, but you are definitely paying for form over function in this case and the form is a classic that will look great in your kitchen! Highly recommended to anybody who is interested in art and design.

I can't say enough about this flatware set. At first I bought two sets, but after receiving them I ended up buying another set so I have service for twelve people. I didn't want to risk them not being available any longer later!Each piece has a great balanced weight to it and feels like a quality item in your hand. These are very modern looking and at the same time very functional. The handle of each utensil is a triangular shape which is very unique among other flatware sets that I looked at. It makes holding these very comfortable since your fingers have three sides to grip rather than the usual two sides on standard flatware.The 18/10 finish gives everything a timeless shine that doesn't wear off. Just running them through the dishwasher produces a shine that will make people think they are polished!If you are looking for a modern set of flatware that will last a lifetime you've found what you should buy!

This is the perfect colander for making "normal" sized meals for a few people. You might need the 5-quart model if you are cooking for a large family, but for me this size is perfect. It easily can hold a few servings of pasta (a box of macaroni for example). The stainless steel design seems very durable and also cleans easily in the dishwasher. The rubberized grips add a nice touch and the rubberized bottom makes for soft placement on any surface. You can easily sit this directly in your sink and pour pasta into it to let it drain hands-free.

This is the perfect scanner to go with your laptop. It is very small and does not require a separate power supply. I keep mine tucked away under my desk and only take it out when I need it. That way it isn't always just consuming valuable desk space. When I need to use it all I have to do is plug it into the USB port on my computer and it's ready to go!This scanner and the Canon software allows you to do multiple things. I mainly use it for scanning documents to PDFs and also for scanning in color photograph prints.As a PDF creator it is nice because you can easily convert your paper documents to PDFs for sending contracts or for just eliminating some clutter and moving your file cabinet into your computer. The only downside is that since it doesn't have any type of document feeder you have to scan each page separate which can be a little time consuming if you have large multi-page documents.For photos it works great. I'm slowly converting a huge collection of family photos into digital copies so I can just manage all my "new" photos from digital cameras with my "old" photos from film on my computer in one giant library. A nice feature when scanning photos is that you can place multiple photos on the scanner at the same time and it will recognize where the edges of each photo are and automatically create separate image files for each photo. This allows you to quickly scan 3 or 4 photos at the same time.All in all this is a great little scanner and the price simply can't be beat!One piece of advice is you may need to run the platen calibration routine once you get the scanner setup. This is accessed from within the ScanGear software. I initially had an issue where my color photos had banding lines and a yellow offset to the color, but this was immediately fixed once I ran the calibration program.

My cats really loved this fountain and it seemed to be a nice product at first, however after running for just a few hours it began to build up a foamy residue on the water. After taking the whole thing apart several times it seems that the water doesn't get filtered very will and quickly becomes dirty as it circulate through the system. This causes a nasty film to build up everywhere. I didn't feel that the water remained safe for my cats to drink so unfortunately I had to stop using it and switch back to their regular water bowls (much to their dismay).I think one of the issues is that this fountain holds so much water the cats will not drink it fast enough and you will end up with a good portion of the water that has been in the fountain for days as you keep just topping it off. Since the fountain is so large and heavy, and the power cord has to be placed just right under the fountain so it remains level, you won't be able to easily just pour out the water each day and start fresh. I think you'd be better off getting a smaller fountain that you can easily empty out completely and refill with fresh water each day.

These lights shine as pure white for your daytime running lights. They look just like the pure white light you see on many brand new cars these days.Installation is super easy, you just swap out your existing bulbs for these and you're done!The only downside is that most cars that use these bulbs for the daytime running lights also use the same bulb (at a higher power) for the high beams. When you use these lights you will essentially be eliminating your high beams as these are designed to just be daytime running lights and don't function the same for the high beams as the halogen bulbs that you will be replacing. If you don't really ever use your high beams then this isn't a big deal.

This case is exactly what I was looking for to use when I'm at the gym or outside exercising.Your phone slides in from the top and is held snugly inside. The headphone port has an access hole in the bottom of the case so you can easily plug your headphones in, and there is a small velcro flap on the side that allows you to coil your unused headphone cable around it so it isn't dangling everywhere while you are exercising.The armband itself fits me fine, but I can see where some other people might need the optional extension if you have super muscular arms. For me (average guy), it is close to the limit on how large the opening can go but still fits fine and stays tight.I have a slim case on my phone that adds a small amount of size to the phone, and it still fits in this armband without having to remove the phone from the case, which is exactly what I was looking for. I can slide my phone, case and all, into the armband, work out, and then quickly remove the phone and case and put it back in my pocket when I'm done.

Grace Wilde is an animal behaviorist with a special skill. She has the psychic ability to hear animals thoughts. However this skill doesn't carry over to hearing human thoughts, just animals. Being able to hear human thoughts would be mighty handy for Grace, especially as she's investigating a murder. That is the murder of her sister's abusive ex-husband, and the police have arrested Grace and are accusing her of murder!! In an attempt to clear her sister's name, Grace ends up hot on the trail of not just a killer, but also a missing horse. This is one mystery that is going to take all of Grace's sleuthing skills and psychic ability to solve.One of my biggest reasons for enjoying this series, besides my natural love of cozy mysteries, is that I really like reading about Grace's abilities. I'm a huge animal lover, and growing up I always wished I could understand my pets. As a kid I thought it would be really fun. Now as an adult, and the human servant to three felines, I'm not sure I want to know what they are thinking about!! However, it's Grace's abilities as a animal psychic that makes this series different to all the cozy mysteries released every month, and I really enjoy this aspect.I enjoyed the mystery aspect of Horse of a Different Killer, and I had a hard time untangling the clues that were laid about by Laura Morrigan for Grace (and myself too!) to solve. This was definitely a mystery that kept me guessing right until the end.This series is such a perfect fit for me, with my love of animals and mysteries alike, and I think many animal lovers and readers will simply fall head over heels for it. When a mystery starts with a cute, cuddly koala that Grace is trying to rescue, the cute factor is at a all-time high and you know it can only get better!If you haven't read it yet, pick up the first book in the series, Woof at the Door.

Connie Archer is back with another Soup Lover's Mystery with Ladle to the Grave. In Snowflake, Vermont, it's May and the residents are looking to welcome Spring in. However, Spring begins with a big bang, when a few locals participate in a Pagan festival, and one lady ends up dead! When the police determine the cause as poisoning from some herbs in a wine she drank, they start to point their finger at Lucky Jamieson's grandfather, Jack. Now Lucky will have her hands full between managing her soup shop, finding a killer and making a dress for her best friend's upcoming wedding!Ladle to the Grave was my first trip to Snowflake, VT, but it certainly won't be my last. Living in a country that has six months of winter I'm a big soup person. There is nothing better than curling up with a book and a big bowl of warm, hearty soup in the middle of winter!! That warm, cozy feeling is how I felt reading Ladle to the Grave.I really liked that Connie Archer started this book off with a murder. There was no slow opening chapters. No, she throws you right into the murder, leaving you to decide who could have wanted to kill this poor lady. Was it someone against the Pagan festival? Or was it something else? From there is a action packed story, as another death drops down on Lucky, and she races against time to figure out the killer before Jack ends up in jail!Ladle to the Grave was a fun read. As this was my first introduction to the series, I liked that I could read it without feeling lost. Connie Archer sets up the characters nicely for those new to the series, without repeating facts from previous mysteries. I liked the ecclectic mix of characters in Snowflake, and certainly loved the virtual smells of the soups Sage makes in Lucky's soup shop, By the Spoonful.All in all Ladle to the Grave was a very enjoyable mystery. With a tasty mystery, mouth-watering recipes to try, and even a wine to brew, it hit all the right spots, and I'm looking forward to reading more books in this series.

Suspendered Sentence is the fourth book in the Amish Mysteries by Laura Bradford.
